value.info_text:
Not the Master himself, nor all the orcs in fallen Reknor, nor even the terrifying unknown beyond Reknor's portal could slow your pursuit of the Staff of Absorption.

Children will hear of your relentlessness in song for years to come.

When activated, this ability reduces the duration of all active detrimental effects by 20% of your associated save value or 2, whichever is greater:

Physical effect durations -2, -5, -10, -15, -20 turns

Magical effect durations -2, -5, -10, -15, -20 turns

Mental effect durations -2, -5, -10, -15, -20 turns
value.name: Relentless Pursuit

value2.info_text:
Not the Master himself, nor all the orcs in fallen Reknor, nor even the terrifying unknown beyond Reknor's portal could slow your pursuit of the Staff of Absorption.

Children will hear of your relentlessness in song for years to come.

When activated, this ability reduces the duration of all active detrimental effects by 20% of your associated save value or 2, whichever is greater:

Physical effect durations -2, -5, -10, -15, -20 turns

Magical effect durations -2, -5, -10, -15, -20 turns

Mental effect durations -2, -5, -10, -15, -20 turns
value2.name: Relentless Pursuit

value.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 Mental Save and increasing your maximum life by 13%, 17%, 20%, 23%, 25% (Currently: 124, 169, 201, 227, 250).

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chant of Fortitude

value2.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 Mental Save and increasing your maximum life by 11%, 14%, 18%, 20%, 23% (Currently: 108, 142, 174, 204, 231).

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Chant of Fortitude

value.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% fire, lightning, acid and cold damage resistance, 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 spell save and reduces the damage from enemies 3 or more spaces away by 15%, 22%, 27%, 30%, 33%.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chant of Resistance

value2.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% fire, lightning, acid and cold damage resistance, 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 spell save and reduces the damage from enemies 3 or more spaces away by 16%, 22%, 27%, 30%, 32%.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Chant of Resistance

value.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Sun, in the form of three defensive Chants.

Chant of Fortitude: Increases your mental save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6 and maximum life by 8%.

Chant of Fortress: Increases your physical save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your physical resistance by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%, your armour by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and your armour hardiness by 15%.

Chant of Resistance: Increases you spell save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your fire/cold/lightning/acid resistances by 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 3% and reduces all damage that comes from distant enemies (3 spaces or more) by -6%.

You may only have one Chant active at a time.
value.name: Chant Acolyte

value2.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Sun, in the form of three defensive Chants.

Chant of Fortitude: Increases your mental save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6 and maximum life by 7%.

Chant of Fortress: Increases your physical save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your physical resistance by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%, your armour by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and your armour hardiness by 15%.

Chant of Resistance: Increases you spell save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your fire/cold/lightning/acid resistances by 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 3% and reduces all damage that comes from distant enemies (3 spaces or more) by -6%.

You may only have one Chant active at a time.
value2.name: Chant Acolyte

value.info_text:
Your skill at Chanting now extends the cloak of light, increasing your light radius by 1, 1, 2, 3, 4.

Also, when you start a new Chant, you will be cured of all cross-tier effects and cured of up to 1, 1, 1, 1, 2 debuffs.

Chant of Fortitude cures mental effects.

Chant of Fortress cures physical effects.

Chant of Resistance cures magical effects.
value.name: Chant Adept

value2.info_text:
Your skill at Chanting now extends the cloak of light, increasing your light radius by 1, 1, 2, 3, 4.

Also, when you start a new Chant, you will be cured of all cross-tier effects and cured of up to 0, 1, 1, 1, 2 debuffs.

Chant of Fortitude cures mental effects.

Chant of Fortress cures physical effects.

Chant of Resistance cures magical effects.
value2.name: Chant Adept

value.info_text:
Your passion for singing the praises of the Sun reaches its zenith.

Your Chanting now increases your light and fire damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and up to 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 times per turn, when you are hit by a weapon attack, you will gain 2.3, 3.5, 4.4, 5.1, 5.8 Positive.

These values scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chant Radiant

value2.info_text:
Your passion for singing the praises of the Sun reaches its zenith.

Your Chanting now increases your light and fire damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and up to 0, 1, 2, 3, 3 times per turn, when you are hit by a weapon attack, you will gain 2.3, 3.5, 4.4, 5.1, 5.8 Positive.

These values scale with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Chant Radiant

value.info_text:
Conjure a surge of celestial power through your circles. Any foe standing within one of your circles will be slowed by 50% for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns and take 48, 66, 79, 90, 100 light and 48, 66, 79, 90, 100 darkness damage.

Residual power from the surge will emanate from your circles for 3, 6, 7, 9, 10 turns; each circle you stand in will increase your celestial resources.

Shifting Shadows: +1 negative.

Sanctity: +1 postive.

Warding: +0.5 postive and negative.
value.name: Celestial Surge

value2.info_text:
Conjure a surge of celestial power through your circles. Any foe standing within one of your circles will be slowed by 50% for 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns and take 48, 66, 79, 90, 100 light and 48, 66, 79, 90, 100 darkness damage.

Residual power from the surge will emanate from your circles for 2, 6, 8, 10, 10 turns; each circle you stand in will increase your celestial resources.

Shifting Shadows: +1 negative.

Sanctity: +1 postive.

Warding: +0.5 postive and negative.
value2.name: Celestial Surge

value.info_text:
In a pure display of power, you project a ranged melee attack, doing 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% weapon damage.

If the target is outside of melee range, you have a chance to project a second attack against it for 58%, 84%, 105%, 123%, 140% weapon damage.

The second strike chance (which increases with distance) is 11%, 18%, 25%, 30%, 35% at range 2 and 35%, 52%, 63%, 71%, 77% at the maximum range of 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

The range will increase with your Strength.
value.name: Wave of Power

value2.info_text:
In a pure display of power, you project a ranged melee attack, doing 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% weapon damage.

If the target is outside of melee range, you have a chance to project a second attack against it for 62%, 90%, 113%, 132%, 150% weapon damage.

The second strike chance (which increases with distance) is 10%, 19%, 26%, 32%, 37% at range 2 and 37%, 55%, 65%, 71%, 75% at the maximum range of 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

The range will increase with your Strength.
value2.name: Wave of Power

value.info_text:
Your weapon attacks burn with righteous fury, dealing 59%, 74%, 86%, 96%, 105% of your lost HP as additional Fire damage (up to 277, 376, 452, 517, 575, Current: 0).

Targets struck are also afflicted with a Martyrdom effect that causes them to take 9%, 15%, 19%, 22%, 24% of all damage they deal for 4 turns.

The bonus damage can only occur once per turn.
value.name: Weapon of Wrath

value2.info_text:
Your weapon attacks burn with righteous fury, dealing 28%, 62%, 74%, 80%, 84% of your lost HP as additional Fire damage (up to 277, 376, 452, 517, 575, Current: 0).

Targets struck are also afflicted with a Martyrdom effect that causes them to take 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28% of all damage they deal for 4 turns.

The bonus damage can only occur once per turn.
value2.name: Weapon of Wrath

value.info_text: Any attack that would drop you below 1 hit point instead triggers Second Life, deactivating the talent, setting your hit points to 1, then healing you for 199, 309, 387, 448, 499.
value.name: Second Life

value2.info_text: Any attack that would drop you below 1 hit point instead triggers Second Life, deactivating the talent, setting your hit points to 1, then healing you for 119, 232, 329, 411, 483.
value2.name: Second Life

value.info_text:
Fire an orb of negative energy towards a spot within range 4, 5, 6, 7, 8.

When the orb reaches its destination, it will teleport you to its location.

The speed of the projectile (231%, 318%, 369%, 404%, 432%) increases with your movement speed
value.name: Astral Path

value2.info_text:
Fire an orb of negative energy towards a spot within range 4, 5, 6, 7, 8.

When the orb reaches its destination, it will teleport you to its location.

The speed of the projectile (231%, 318%, 369%, 404%, 432%) increases with your movement speed
value2.name: Astral Path

value.info_text:
Sends out a slow-moving spiral of cosmic energy towards a target location within range 8.

As the cosmic energy moves, it pulls in targets adjacent to it, dealing 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 darkness damage and granting you 1 negative energy per hit.
value.name: Galactic Pulse

value2.info_text:
Sends out a slow-moving spiral of cosmic energy towards a target location within range 8.

As the cosmic energy moves, it pulls in targets adjacent to it, dealing 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 darkness damage and granting you 1 negative energy per hit.
value2.name: Galactic Pulse

value.info_text:
Expend all of your negative energy to create a massive burst of dark energy (radius 1) at a target location within range 6.

This deals 89, 120, 145, 165, 184 darkness damage and pins targets hit for 2 turns.

The damage and pin chance increase with your spellpower, and the damage, radius and pin duration all increase with negative energy and talent level
value.name: Supernova

value2.info_text:
Expend all of your negative energy to create a massive burst of dark energy (radius 1) at a target location within range 6.

This deals 89, 120, 145, 165, 184 darkness damage and pins targets hit for 2 turns.

The damage and pin chance increase with your spellpower, and the damage, radius and pin duration all increase with negative energy and talent level
value2.name: Supernova

value.info_text: You mark a target with light for 3 turns, causing all melee hits you deal to it to heal you for 19%, 31%, 39%, 45%, 49% of the damage done.
value.name: Mark of Light

value2.info_text: You mark a target with light for 3 turns, causing all melee hits you deal to it to heal you for 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% of the damage done.
value2.name: Mark of Light

value.info_text:
Open a radius 1 rift in spacetime at the targeted location for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns, increasing in radius by 1 each turn to a maximum of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2.

All caught within the rift are pulled towards the center and take 24, 33, 40, 45, 50 gravity damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Collapse

value.info_text:
Attune yourself to the endless hunger of distant dead suns. For the next 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, your attacks will inflict an additional 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 gravity damage and attempt to pull enemies closer. After three turns, you will recover half of all damage taken during this effect.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Devourer Stance

value.info_text: Create a gravity field around you that converts 9%, 21%, 29%, 35%, 40% of all damage you deal into physical damage, slows incoming projectiles by 10%, 27%, 37%, 44%, 50%, and causes your gravity damage to reduce the target's knockback resistance by half for two turns.
value.name: Singularity Armor

value.info_text:
Infuse your weapon with overwhelming gravitational power while spinning around.

All creatures within radius 2 take 90%, 107%, 120%, 131%, 141% weapon damage as physical (gravity) and are pulled closer.

Then, all adjacent creatures take 91%, 116%, 135%, 152%, 166% weapon damage. This second strike shields you for between 149, 202, 243, 278, 308 and 298, 404, 486, 556, 617, increasing with more enemies hit. The shield lasts for 2 turns.

The shield strength will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Doom Spiral

value.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 45%, 51%, 56%, 60%, 64% damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and has their bleed resistance reduced by 50%.

The stun chance increases with your Physical Power.

It may not bleed, exactly, but you'll make it hurt.
value.name: Brutalize

value.info_text:
Your curse feeds on the magic, which in turn is powered by the curse.

You gain a bonus to Spellpower equal to 21%, 28%, 35%, 40%, 46% of your Willpower.

You gain a bonus to Mindpower equal to 27%, 36%, 43%, 51%, 57% of your Magic.

Something is not quite right inside you. Your solar spells are somehow twisted, but your bloody rites make things clear as day.
value.name: Lunacy

value.info_text:
Fade into the darkness and reappear elsewhere within range 3, 4, 6, 7, 8. When you emerge from the shadows, you are accompanied by a bright flash, dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 light damage to enemies in radius 1.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Flee the Sun

value.info_text:
Put all of your physical and magical might into one devastating attack.

Strike all adjacent enemies for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage and daze them (using your highest power) for 3 turns.

Using this talent consumes all of your Positive Energy and prevents you from generating positive energy for 5 turns.

Every point of positive energy increases the damage by 1.11%, 1.50%, 1.79%, 2.04%, 2.25%.

Every 15 points of positive energy increase the radius by 1 (up to 10).
value.name: Final Sunbeam

value.info_text:
Even now, something compels you to sing.

Dirge of Famine: Increases health regen by 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.

Dirge of Conquest: Gives you part of a turn on critical (10%) or kill (33%, 47%, 55%, 62%, 67%).

Dirge of Pestilence: Shields you for 0 when an enemy inflicts a detrimental effect on you (5 turn cooldown).

You may only have one Dirge active at a time.
value.name: Dirge Acolyte

value.info_text:
Your dirges carry the pain within you, which threatens to swallow those who come too close. Anyone who hits you in melee suffers 73, 99, 119, 135, 151 mind damage.

You, on the other hand, are steadied by the song. Your dirges increase your resistance to stun and knockback by 15%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50%.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower and your level.
value.name: Dirge Intoner

value.info_text:
Your dirges echo mournfully through the air. When you end a dirge, you continue to gain its acolyte-level effects for 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 turns. You can only benefit from one such lingering dirge at a time.

Furthermore, you are given focus by the song. Your dirges increase your resistance to confusion and fear by 15%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50%.
value.name: Dirge Adept

value.info_text:
Your dirges deaden you to the outside world, reducing all incoming damage by 25, 34, 41, 47, 52.

The damage reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Dirge Nihilist

value.info_text:
Sing a song of wasting and desolation which sustains you in hard times.

This dirge increases your health regeneration by 16, 26, 35, 43, 51. The regeneration will increase with your level.
value.name: Dirge of Famine

value.info_text:
Sing a song of violence and victory (mostly violence) and sustain yourself through cruelty.

Each time you deal a critical strike you gain 10% of a turn (only once per turn).

Each time you kill a creature you gain 33%, 47%, 55%, 62%, 67% of a turn (only once per turn).
value.name: Dirge of Conquest

value.info_text:
Sing a song of decay and defiance and sustain yourself through spite.

Each time you suffer a detrimental effect, you gain a shield with strength 63, 117, 163, 206, 246, that lasts as long as the effect would. This will add to and extend an existing shield if possible.

This can only trigger once every 5 turns
value.name: Dirge of Pestilence

value.info_text:
Increases your light and darkness resistance penetration by 27%, 39%, 48%, 55%, 61% for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, and reduces the cooldown of all Celestial skills by 3, 4, 5, 6, 6.

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.
value.name: Totality

value2.info_text:
Increases your light and darkness resistance penetration by 26%, 39%, 49%, 55%, 61% for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, and reduces the cooldown of all Celestial skills by 3, 4, 5, 6, 6.

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.
value2.name: Totality

value.info_text:
When one of your spells goes critical, you bind glyphs in radius 1 centered on a random target in range 10 at the cost of 5 positive and 5 negative energy.

Glyphs last for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns and cause various effects when an enemy enters their grid.

Glyphs will only spawn on enemies that aren't adjacent to an existing glyph.

This can only happen every 4 game turns.

Glyph effects will scale with your Spellpower.

Avalable glyphs are:

Glyph of Sunlight: Bind sunlight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a brilliant light, dealing 0.00 light damage and healing you for 65, 89, 107, 122, 136.

Glyph of Moonlight: Bind moonlight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a fatiguing darkness, dealing 0.00 darkness damage and reducing the foes damage dealt by 52%, 70%, 84%, 97%, 100% for 2 turns.

Glyph of Twilight: Bind twilight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a burst of twilight, dealing 0.00 light and 0.00 darkness damage and knocking the foe back 1 tiles.
value.name: Glyphs

value2.info_text:
When one of your spells goes critical, you bind glyphs in radius 1 centered on a random target in range 10 at the cost of 5 positive and 5 negative energy.

Glyphs last for 2, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns and cause various effects when an enemy enters their grid.

Glyphs will only spawn on enemies that aren't adjacent to an existing glyph and will prioritize your own position if it is valid.

This can only happen every 4 game turns.

Glyph effects will scale with your Spellpower.

Avalable glyphs are:

Glyph of Sunlight: Bind sunlight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a brilliant light, dealing 0.00 light damage and healing you for 65, 89, 107, 122, 136.

Glyph of Moonlight: Bind moonlight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a fatiguing darkness, dealing 0.00 darkness damage and reducing the foes damage dealt by 52%, 70%, 84%, 97%, 100% for 2 turns.

Glyph of Twilight: Bind twilight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a burst of twilight, dealing 0.00 light and 0.00 darkness damage and knocking the foe back 1 tiles.
value2.name: Glyphs

value.info_text:
Your glyphs are imbued with celestial fury; they last 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns longer and when triggered they will deal damage.

Glyph of Sunlight: Deals 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 light damage.

Glyph of Moonlight: Deals 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 darkness damage.

Glyph of Twilight: Deals 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 light and 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 darkness damage.
value.name: Glyphs of Fury

value2.info_text:
Your glyphs are imbued with celestial fury; they last 2, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns longer and when triggered they will deal damage.

Glyph of Sunlight: Deals 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 light damage.

Glyph of Moonlight: Deals 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 darkness damage.

Glyph of Twilight: Deals 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 light and 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 darkness damage.
value2.name: Glyphs of Fury

value.info_text: Up to 3 times per turn when one of your glyphs triggers you feel a surge of celestial power, increasing your darkness and light resistance and affinity by 5% for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns, stacking up to 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 times.
value.name: Empowered Glyphs

value2.info_text: Up to 3 times per turn when one of your glyphs triggers you feel a surge of celestial power, increasing your darkness and light resistance and affinity by 5% for 2, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns, stacking up to 2, 4, 4, 5, 5 times.
value2.name: Empowered Glyphs

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, granting you 19%, 29%, 35%, 40%, 45% stun, blindness and confusion resistance.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.
value.name: Hymn of Perseverance

value2.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, granting you 18%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% stun, blindness and confusion resistance.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.
value2.name: Hymn of Perseverance

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, conjuring a shroud of dancing shadows that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a shadowy beam will hit up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage.

This powerful spell will drain 7.0, 5.3, 4.2, 3.5, 3.0 negative energy for each beam; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Moonlight

value2.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, conjuring a shroud of dancing shadows that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a shadowy beam will hit up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage.

This powerful spell will drain 7.1, 4.8, 3.6, 2.9, 2.4 negative energy for each beam; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Hymn of Moonlight

value.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Moons, in the form of three defensive Hymns:

Hymn of Shadows: Increases your movement speed by 1%, 1%, 3%, 4%, 5% and your spell casting speed by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%.

Hymn of Detection: Increases your ability to see stealthy creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and invisible creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, and increases your critical power by 0%, 1%, 2%, 4%, 5%.

Hymn of Perseverance: Increases your resistance to stun, confusion and blinding by 10%.

You may only have one Hymn active at a time.
value.name: Hymn Acolyte

value2.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Moons, in the form of three defensive Hymns:

Hymn of Shadows: Increases your movement speed by 1%, 1%, 3%, 4%, 5% and your spell casting speed by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%.

Hymn of Detection: Increases your ability to see stealthy creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and invisible creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, and increases your critical power by 0%, 1%, 2%, 4%, 5%.

Hymn of Perseverance: Increases your resistance to stun, confusion and blinding by 7%.

You may only have one Hymn active at a time.
value2.name: Hymn Acolyte

value.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will be slowed by 19%, 25%, 29%, 32%, 35% for 5 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (38, 54, 66, 76, 85 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.
value.name: Glyph of Fatigue

value2.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will be slowed by 21%, 26%, 31%, 35%, 39% for 5 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (38, 54, 66, 76, 85 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.
value2.name: Glyph of Fatigue

value.info_text:
You are so infused with sunlight that your body glows permanently in radius 4, 6, 8, 9, 10, even in dark places.

Your vision and body adapt to this glow, giving you 25%, 43%, 53%, 61%, 67% blindness resistance, 17%, 24%, 30%, 35%, 40% light resistance, and 15%, 22%, 27%, 30%, 33% light affinity.

The light radius overrides your normal light if it is bigger (it does not stack).
value.name: Radiance

value2.info_text:
You are so infused with sunlight that your body glows permanently in radius 4, 7, 9, 10, 10, even in dark places.

Your vision adapts to this glow, giving you 34%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 80% blindness resistance.

The light radius overrides your normal light if it is bigger (it does not stack).
value2.name: Radiance

value.info_text:
Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects, dealing 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 170, 230, 277, 317, 352 light damage in radius 1 and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt.

All targets struck by your Judgement will be blighted by light, reducing saves by 31, 43, 52, 59, 66, reducing critical power by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52%, and causing light damage received to splash in radius 2 for 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 55% damage against all hostile targets for 4 turns.
value.name: Judgement

value2.info_text: Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 100, 135, 163, 186, 207 light damage in radius 1 and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt.
value2.name: Judgement

value.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, dealing 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 light damage to all foes caught inside every turn.

Each enemy effected has a 8%, 15%, 20%, 22%, 25% chance of being dazed and blinded by the light for 3 turns. The daze and blind can be applied to each enemy at most once every 7 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
value.name: Searing Sight

value2.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, doing 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 light damage to all non-dazed foes caught inside.

Each enemy effected has a 8%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% chance of being dazed for 5 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Searing Sight

value.info_text:
The light of your Radiance allows you to see that which would normally be unseen and strike that which would normally be protected.

All enemies in your Radiance aura have their invisibility and stealth power reduced by 80;, 104;, 122;, 137;, 151; all actors affected by illumination have their defense reduced by 27, 34, 40, 46, 50 as well as all evasion bonuses from being unseen negated.

In addition, your light damage is increased by 3%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 11% and your strikes ignore 17%, 33%, 41%, 46%, 49% of the light resistance of your targets.

The invisibility, stealth power, and defense reductions increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Illumination

value2.info_text:
The light of your Radiance allows you to see that which would normally be unseen.

All enemies in your Radiance aura have their invisibility and stealth power reduced by 80, 104, 122, 137, 151.

In addition, all actors affected by illumination are easier to see and therefore hit; their defense is reduced by 27, 34, 40, 46, 50 and all evasion bonuses from being unseen are negated.

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Illumination

value.info_text: Create a distortion at the target tile, knocking back all projectiles and changing their direction to face away if possible.
value.name: Diffraction Pulse

value2.info_text: Create a distortion at the target tile, knocking back all projectiles and changing their direction to face away if possible.
value2.name: Diffraction Pulse

value.info_text: Creates a wall 3 units long for 7, 10, 13, 16, 18 turns, reflecting all projectiles that hit it and blocking sight.
value.name: Mirror Wall

value2.info_text: Creates a wall 3 units long for 7, 10, 13, 16, 18 turns, reflecting all projectiles that hit it and blocking sight.
value2.name: Mirror Wall

value.info_text: Target a projectile in mid-flight to clone it and target that projectile independently. You gain ownership over the new projectile.
value.name: Spatial Prism

value.info_text:
Infuse yourself with the raging fury of the Sun, increasing your physical and spell critical chance by 2%, 5%, 8%, 10%, 12%.

Each time you crit with a physical attack or a spell you have 40%, 55%, 64%, 70%, 75% chance to gain Sun's Vengeance for 2 turns.

While affected by Sun's Vengeance, your Sun Ray will take no time to use and will deal 25% more damage.

If Sun Ray was on cooldown, the remaining turns are reduced by one instead.

This effect can only happen once per turn.

value.info_text:

Note that any stairs underneath the jumpgate will be unusable while the spell is sustained, and you may need to cancel this sustain in order to leave certain locations.

At talent level 4, you learn to create and sustain a second jumpgate.

Paradox reductions from held anomalies occur when triggered.

Fold Fate: Deals 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 temporal damage to enemies in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2. Affected targets may lose 30% physical and temporal resistance for 2 turns.

Fold Warp: Deals 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 physical and 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 temporal damage to enemies in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2. Affected targets may be stunned, blinded, confused, or pinned for 2 turns.

Fold Gravity: Deals 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 physical damage to enemies in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2. Affected targets will be slowed (30%) for 2 turns.

Each Fold has an eight turn cooldown. If an effect would be triggered while on cooldown it will reduce the cooldown of the other two Folds by one turn.

value.info_text:
Upon activation summon a Temporal Hound. Every 46, 29, 22, 18, 16 turns another hound will be summoned, up to a maximum of three hounds. If a hound dies you'll summon a new hound in 46, 29, 22, 18, 16 turns.

Your hounds inherit your increased damage percent, have 7%, 14%, 18%, 22%, 25% physical resistance and 30%, 57%, 75%, 89%, 100% temporal resistance, and are immune to teleportation effects.

Hounds will get, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Strength, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Dexterity, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Constitution, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Magic, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Willpower, and 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Cunning, based on your Magic stat.

Command Blink will now regenerate your hounds for 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 life per turn and increase their global speed by 20%, 32%, 40%, 45%, 50% for five turns. Hounds below 1 life when this effect occurs will have the bonuses doubled.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 15%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% stun, blind, confusion, and pin resistance.

The regeneration scales with your Spellpower.

Creatures suffering from that disease will also suffer healing reduction (50%, 59%, 65%, 70%, 75%) and diseases immunity reduction (34%, 44%, 51%, 56%, 59%).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower, and the spread chance increases with the amount of blight damage dealt.

You chant the destruction of Mal'Rok, the demon's homeworld.

Each time you kill a creature you send out a magical ripple in radius 1, 3, 3, 4, 4 that applies a bane of blindness or confusion for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns.

Baned creatures also suffer 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 darkness damage per turn.

Damage increases with your spellpower.
value.name: Tale of Destruction

value2.info_text:
You chant the destruction of Mal'Rok, the demon's homeworld.

Each time you kill a creature you send out a magical ripple in radius 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 that applies a bane of blindness or confusion for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

Baned creatures also suffer 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 darkness damage per turn.

Damage increases with your spellpower.
value2.name: Tale of Destruction

value.info_text:
When you kill a creature, the remainder of the damage done will not be lost. Instead, 66%, 72%, 76%, 79%, 81% of it will splash in a radius 2 as blight damage.

The splash damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Overkill

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
When you are dealt a blow that reduces your life by at least 15%, 11%, 9%, 8%, 8%, you have a 49%, 54%, 58%, 61%, 63% chance to reduce the remaining cooldown of all your talents by 1.

Temporary life from Sanguine Infusion will not count against the damage threshold.

The chance will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Blood Vengeance

value2.info_text:
When you are dealt a blow that reduces your life by at least 14%, 12%, 10%, 9%, 9%, you have a 49%, 55%, 58%, 61%, 63% chance to reduce the remaining cooldown of all your talents by 1.

Temporary life from Sanguine Infusion will not count against the damage threshold.

The chance will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Blood Vengeance

value.info_text:
Use elemental damage dealt to you to trigger terrible effects on the source:

  • Fire: burn for 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage over 5 turns
  • Cold: freeze for 3 turns with 350, 474, 571, 652, 725 iceblock power
  • Acid: blind for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns
  • Lightning: daze for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns
  • Nature: 25%, 38%, 45%, 51%, 55% slow for 4 turns

This effect can only happen once every 10 turns per damage type.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Elemental Discord

value2.info_text:
Use elemental damage dealt to you to trigger terrible effects on the source:

  • Fire: burn for 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage over 5 turns
  • Cold: freeze for 3 turns with 350, 474, 571, 652, 725 iceblock power
  • Acid: blind for 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns
  • Lightning: daze for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns
  • Nature: 20%, 35%, 41%, 45%, 48% slow for 4 turns

This effect can only happen once every 10 turns per damage type.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Elemental Discord

value.info_text:
You manipulate the vim of enemies in radius 4 to temporarily invert all healing done to them (but not natural regeneration).

For 5 turns all healing will instead damage them for 40%, 48%, 53%, 56%, 59% of the healing done as blight.

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Healing Inversion

value2.info_text:

For 5 turns all healing will instead damage them for 44%, 52%, 56%, 59%, 62% of the healing done as blight.

value2.name: Healing Inversion

value.info_text:
You reach out with the shadows silencing and disarming your target for 3 turns.

The shadows will deal 313, 425, 511, 585, 650 darkness damage to the target and pull it to you.

The chance to apply debuffs improves with your Accuracy and the damage with your Spellpower.
value.name: Shadow Grasp

value.info_text:
You become a master of your craft, allowing you to focus on a single tool (currently none) to greatly improve its capabilities:

Grappling Hook (Grappling Hook Mastery)

Your grappling hook deals 100% unarmed damage when it hits, plus a further 104, 127, 144, 158, 170 physical and 104, 127, 144, 158, 170 nature damage over 4 turns.

Rogue's Brew (Rogue's Brew Mastery)

Your Rogue's Brew fortifies you for 8 turns, preventing you from dying until you reach -156, -347, -494, -617, -726 life.

Dart Launcher (Dart Launcher Mastery)

Your darts ignore poison and sleep immunity and waking targets are slowed by 20%, 29%, 34%, 37%, 40% for 4 turns.

Smokescreen (Smokescreen Mastery)

Your Smokescreen is infused with chokedust. Enemies in the smoke take 87, 105, 118, 128, 138 nature damage and may be silenced.

Hidden Blades (Assassinate)

You prime your Hidden Blades to cause bleeding and facilitate the Assassinate ability, which allows you to strike twice for 241%, 266%, 285%, 302%, 316% unarmed damage, hitting automatically while ignoring armor and resistance.

The effects depend on this talent's level.

Mastering a new tool places it (and its special effects, as appropriate) on cooldown.
value.name: Master Artificer

Hidden Blades (Assassinate)

Mastering a new tool places it (and its special effects, as appropriate) on cooldown.

This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

The slow effect becomes more powerful with your Cunning.

At rank 3 the cooldowns of all of your Called Shots Talents are reduced by 2 each. At rank 5 you gain 15%, 24%, 35%, 43%, 49% Physical resistance penetration with all Called Shot attacks.

value2.name: Sling Sniper

value.info_text:
Your quick wit gives you a big advantage against disabled targets, increasing your damage by 4%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 11% for each disabling effect the target is under, to a maximum of 14%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 34%.

For this purpose, disabling effects are stun, blind, daze, confuse, pin, disarm, cripple and silence.

In addition, for each disabling effect the target is under, your melee attacks have a 2%, 4%, 5%, 6%, 7% (to a maximum of 7%, 12%, 16%, 19%, 22%) chance to inflict a new effect on them (that they do not already have): either disarm, cripple (25% power) or pin for 2 turns.

The chance to further disable the target increases with your Accuracy.
value.name: Backstab

value2.info_text:
Your quick wit gives you a big advantage against disabled targets, increasing your damage by 4%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 11% for each disabling effect the target is under, to a maximum of 14%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 34%.

For this purpose, disabling effects are stun, blind, daze, confuse, pin, disarm, cripple and silence.

In addition, for each disabling effect the target is under, your melee attacks have a 1%, 2%, 4%, 5%, 6% (to a maximum of 4%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 18%) chance to inflict a new effect on them (that they do not already have): either disarm, cripple (25% power) or pin for 2 turns.

The chance to further disable the target increases with your Accuracy.
value2.name: Backstab

The chance to inflict these effects increase with your Accuracy.

Enhance your Deadly Poison with a stoning agent. Whenever you apply Deadly Poison, you afflict your target with an additional earth-based poison that inflicts 13, 14, 16, 17, 17 nature damage per turn (stacking up to 52, 59, 64, 68, 71 damage per turn) for 6, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns.

After either 7, 5, 4, 3, 2 turns or the poison has run its course (<100% chance, see effect description), the target will be turned to stone for 3, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
value.name: Stoning Poison

Learn how to coat your melee weapons, throwing knives, sling and bow ammo with poison, giving your attacks a 30%, 37%, 42%, 46%, 50% chance to poison the target for 22, 27, 30, 33, 36 nature damage per turn for 4, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns. Every application of the poison stacks, up to a maximum of 91, 109, 123, 134, 144 nature damage per turn.

The damage scales with your Cunning.

After either 13 turns or the poison has run its course (<100% chance, see effect description), the target will be turned to stone for 2 turns.

value.name: Stoning Poison

value.info_text:
You strike your target with your melee or ranged weapon, doing 165%, 184%, 199%, 211%, 222% weapon damage as nature and inflicting additional effects based on your active vile poisons:

Numbing Poison - Reduces global speed by 20%, 26%, 30%, 32%, 35% for 5 turns.

Insidious Poison - Applies a standard poison that deals 185, 240, 282, 316, 346 nature damage over 5 turns.

Crippling Poison - Places 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 talents on cooldown for 1, 3, 4, 6, 6 turns.

Leeching Poison - Heals you for 185, 240, 281, 315, 345.

Volatile Poison - Deals a further 111, 144, 169, 190, 207 nature damage to foes in a radius 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 ball.

Learning this talent in addition to the Throwing Knives talent allows you to learn the Venomous Throw talent, which can be used to throw poisoned daggers at your foes, but is put on cooldown when this talent is used.
value.name: Venomous Strike

value.info_text:
Your abilities in sowing confusion and chaos have reached their peak. Whenever a foe attempts to apply a detrimental physical effect to you, they have a 15%, 23%, 28%, 32%, 35% chance to fail. If there is an adjacent enemy to you, you misdirect your foe into applying it to them at 30%, 39%, 46%, 51%, 55% duration.

You gain 24, 32, 38, 42, 46 defense.

The chance to apply status effects increases with your Accuracy and the Defense with your Cunning.
value.name: Misdirection

value2.info_text:
Your abilities in sowing confusion and chaos have reached their peak. Whenever a foe attempts to apply a detrimental physical effect to you, they have a 14%, 26%, 31%, 35%, 37% chance to fail. If there is an adjacent enemy to you, you misdirect your foe into applying it to them at 32%, 42%, 50%, 55%, 60% duration.

You gain 24, 32, 38, 42, 46 defense.

The chance to apply status effects increases with your Accuracy and the Defense with your Cunning.
value2.name: Misdirection

value.info_text:
Your melee and ranged attacks leave your foes unable to focus on any complex actions, giving them a stacking 3% chance of failure the next time they try to use a talent (to a maximum of 12%, 27%, 36%, 39%, 45%).

If any effect causes the target's turn to fail they fumble and injure themself, taking 139, 181, 212, 238, 260 physical damage.

If the turn loss was caused by this effect then Fumble is removed.

The damage dealt increases with your Cunning.
value.name: Fumble

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
You draw energy from the depths of the shadows.

While sustained, you regenerate 0.47, 0.66, 0.78, 0.87, 0.95 mana per turn, and your physical and spell attack speed increases by 3.7%, 8.5%, 12%, 16%, 18%.
value.name: Shadow Feed

value2.info_text:

value2.name: Shadow Feed

value.info_text:
Enters stealth mode (power 41, 52, 59, 64, 69, based on Cunning), making you harder to detect.

If successful (re-checked each turn), enemies will not know exactly where you are, or may not notice you at all.

Stealth reduces your light radius to 0, increases your infravision by 3, and will not work with heavy or massive armours.

You cannot enter stealth if there are foes in sight within range 9, 7, 6, 5, 5.

Any non-instant, non-movement action will break stealth if not otherwise specified.

Enemies uncertain of your location will still make educated guesses at it.

While stealthed, enemies cannot share information about your location with each other and will be delayed in telling their allies that you exist at all.
value.name: Stealth

value2.info_text:

If successful (re-checked each turn), enemies will not know exactly where you are, or may not notice you at all.

Stealth reduces your light radius to 0, increases your infravision by 3, and will not work with heavy or massive armours.

You cannot enter stealth if there are foes in sight within range 9, 7, 6, 5, 4.

You have a special affinity for darkness and shadows.

When standing in an unlit grid, the minimum range to your foes for activating stealth or for maintaining it after a Shadow Dance is reduced by 1, 3, 3, 4, 4.

While stealthed, your life regeneration is increased by 5.9, 7.5, 8.9, 10, 11 (based on your Cunning) and your stamina regeneration is increased by 1.2, 1.7, 2.2, 2.6, 2.9. The regeneration effects persist for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns after exiting stealth, with 5 times the normal rate.
value.name: Soothing Darkness

value2.name: Soothing Darkness

value.info_text:
Deploy a noisy lure that attracts all creatures within radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 to it for 5, 8, 11, 13, 15 turns.

It has 150, 187, 213, 233, 250 life (based on your Cunning) and is very durable, with 11, 17, 21, 25, 28 armor and 65%, 68%, 71%, 73%, 75% resistance to non-physical damage.

At level 5, when the lure is destroyed, it will trigger some traps in a radius of 2 around it (check individual trap descriptions to see if they are triggered).

Use of this talent will not break stealth.
value.name: Lure

value2.info_text:
Deploy a noisy lure that attracts all creatures within radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 to it for 5, 8, 11, 13, 15 turns.

value.info_text:
You learn new techniques for setting traps.

Deploying one of your traps is possible up to 1 grids from you, takes 8%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 23% less time than normal, and has 1%, 2%, 3%, 5%, 6% less chance to break stealth.
value.name: Advanced Trap Deployment

value2.info_text:
You learn new techniques for setting traps.

Deploying one of your traps is possible up to 1 grids from you, takes 7%, 12%, 17%, 20%, 23% less time than normal, and has 1%, 2%, 3%, 5%, 6% less chance to break stealth.
value2.name: Advanced Trap Deployment

value.info_text:
Lay a trap that creates a radius 5 gravitic anomaly when triggered by foes approaching within range 1. Each turn, the anomaly deals 77, 91, 102, 111, 120 temporal damage (based on your Magic) to foes while pulling them towards its center (chance increases with your combat accuracy or spell power, whichever is higher).

Each anomaly lasts 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns (up to the amount of time since the last anomaly dissipated, based on your Trap Mastery skill).

The trap may trigger more than once, but requires at least 2 turns to recharge between activations.

This design does not require advanced preparation to use.
value.name: Gravitic Trap

value.info_text:
Lay a magical trap that summons a trio of shadowy rogues to attack the target.

The rogues receive your damage bonuses and are permanently stealthed.

They disappear after 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns or when their work is done.

value.info_text:
Deploy a hidden spring-loaded catapult that will trigger (by pressure) for any creature passing over it. Victims will be knocked back towards a target location up to 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 grids away and be dazed for 5 turns.

This trap has a 89%, 92%, 93%, 94%, 95% chance to reset itself after triggering, but can only trigger once per turn.

The chance to affect the target improves with your combat accuracy.

value.info_text:
Teleport to an enemy, striking them for 100% weapon damage, bleeding them for 141%, 170%, 193%, 212%, 229% weapon damage over five turns, and marking them for six turns. You will not teleport if you are already adjacent.

When the marked enemy dies, the cooldown of this talent will be reduced by two turns for every turn the mark had remaining.

Each point in Bloodstained talents reduces the amount of damage you take from bleed effects by 2%
value.name: Blood Rush

value.info_text:
Cut into an enemy and twist the blade, dealing 141%, 166%, 185%, 202%, 216% damage and increasing the intensity of their existing bleed effects by 154%, 208%, 249%, 284%, 314%.

Each point in Bloodstained talents reduces the amount of damage you take from bleed effects by 2%
value.name: Blood Rage

value.info_text:
Your melee attacks also cause the target to bleed for 32%, 59%, 80%, 97%, 112% of the damage dealt over five turns.

Each point in Bloodstained talents reduces the amount of damage you take from bleed effects by 2%
value.name: Blood Bath

value.info_text:
Your hunger for violence and suffering sustains you. All damage you do heals you for a portion of the damage done, from 1%, 1%, 1%, 1%, 2% (at 0 Hate to) 5%, 6%, 8%, 9%, 10% (at max Hate). You can recover no more than 1/6 of your max life each turn this way.

Each point in Bloodstained talents reduces the amount of damage you take from bleed effects by 2%
value.name: Blood Thirst

value.info_text:
You displace 9%, 15%, 19%, 22%, 24% of any damage you receive onto a random bleeding enemy within range 5. This redirected damage is amplified by 130%, 157%, 175%, 189%, 200%.

All living things are linked by blood. It is one river, flowing through all.
value.name: Shared Agony

value.info_text:
When you kill an enemy, their death forms a cursed magical pattern on the ground. This creates a circle of radius 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 which blinds enemies and deals them 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 light damage, while giving you 2 positive energy per turn. The circle lasts for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

The duration of the circle can be increased by a critical hit.

The blind chance increases with your Spellpower.

You can activate this talent to draw the pattern in your own blood, creating it underneath you at the cost of 5% of your maximum life.
value.name: Splatter Sigils

value.info_text:
Dooms all enemies within a radius 2 ball for 20 turns. Each time an affected target uses a talent, it takes 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 physical damage as its life is drawn out. In addition, any bleed applied to the target will have its power increased by 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

The chance to apply will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Mark of the Vampire

value.info_text:
Draw on the wounds of enemies within range 10, healing yourself and putting them into a merciful sleep.

The sleep chance increases with your Spellpower.

You are healed for 20% of the remaining damage of bleed effects on enemies in range (minimum 11, 17, 21, 25, 28 per bleed). Enemies fall asleep for 0, 1, 3, 4, 5 turns longer than their longest-lasting bleed, rendering them unable to act. The strength of the sleep effect is based on the strength of the bleed. Excess damage will reduce their sleep duration.

When the sleep ends, each target will benefit from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 50% sleep immunity.
value.name: Rosebloom

value.info_text: Reduces the damage you take from bleeds by 0%
value.name: Blood Clot

value.info_text:
Your defiling touch permeates everything around you, permanently imparting a random curse on each item you find. When you equip a cursed item, you gain the effects of that curse (shown as a beneficial effect). Each item with the same curse that is equipped increases the curse's power. Initially curses are harmful, but powerful benefits accumulate as the power of the curse increases.

The Dark Gifts talent unlocks higher level curse effects and increases their power.

Your aura permeates your equipment more thoroughly with talent level and can affect items as follows:

  • Level 1 — weapons
  • Level 2 — body armor and cloaks
  • Level 3 — shields and helmets
  • Level 4 — gloves, boots and belts
  • Level 6 — rings
  • Level 7 — amulets/necklaces
  • Level 8 — lites
  • Level 9 — tools/totems/torques/wands
  • level 10 — ammunition

At level 5, you can activate this talent to surround yourself with an aura that adds 2 levels to a curse of your choosing. (None chosen)

Also, talent levels above 5 reduce the negative effects of your curses (currently 0%, 0%, 0%, 3%, 19% reduction).
value.name: Defiling Touch

value.info_text:
Your body's strength is fed by your hatred. This causes most forms of healing to be between 50% effective (at 0 Hate) to 100% effective (at 100+ Hate). In addition, after each kill, you store the waning life force to invigorate yourself, restoring 55, 74, 90, 103, 114 life (limited by the foe's maximum life, up to a maximum of 140, 188, 225, 256, 284 at any time). You can heal no more than 30, 40, 47, 53, 59 life per turn this way, and it is not affected by your hatred level or other effects.

Healing from kills improves with your Willpower.
value.name: Unnatural Body

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

The number of extra strikes increases at higher talent levels.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

Damage increases with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Use a gesture of pain in place of a normal attack to assault the minds of your enemies, inflicting between 43, 59, 70, 80, 89 and 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 mind damage. If the attack succeeds, there is a 14%, 17%, 19%, 20%, 21% chance to stun your opponent for 3 turns.

This strike replaces your melee physical and checks your Mindpower against your opponent's Mental Save, and is thus not affected by your Accuracy or the enemy's Defense. The base damage (doubled) and the critical chance of any Mindstars equipped are added in when this attack is performed.

This talent requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands and has a 25% chance to inflict brainlock, which can critically hit. The damage will increase with your Mindpower.

If attacking with two mindstars the attack will trigger their proc effects, if any.

Mindstars bonuses from damage and physical criticals: (+0 damage, +0 critical chance)

Deflected attacks cannot be crits.

If Gesture of Pain is active, you also have a 5.0%, 6.6%, 7.7%, 8.7%, 9.5% chance to counterattack.

Every turn, all enemies in your gloom take 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 mind damage and 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 darkness damage.

This damage is increased by your global speed but only happens ever game turn.

The damage scales with your Mindpower.

Each point in Gloom talents increases your Mindpower (current total: 2, 6, 9, 12, 15).
value.name: Mindrot

value2.info_text:
Every time you act, all enemies in your gloom take 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 mind damage and 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 darkness damage.

The damage scales with your Mindpower.

Each point in Gloom talents increases your Mindpower (current total: 2, 6, 9, 12, 15).

value.info_text:
At the start of each turn, if you're bleeding, you gain 2 hate.

You can activate this talent to use your own life for power, bleeding yourself for a small portion of your maximum life (91, 71, 59, 53, 48 damage) over the next 5 turns. This bleed cannot be resisted or removed, but can be reduced by Bloodstained.
value.name: Self-Sacrifice

value.info_text:
Increases critical chance by 3%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 12% (at all times) and critical strike power by up to 12%, 23%, 32%, 41%, 49% (based on hate).

Anger makes you strong. And you're always angry.
value.name: Self-Loathing

value.info_text:
Call upon your deepest reserves of strength to win no matter the cost.

Immediately upon activation and every turn while this talent is active, your detrimental effects expire and your talents cool down as if an extra turn had passed.

This bonus cooldown occurs even if your talents would not normally cool down.

This talent deactivates automatically upon rest.

This strength comes at a cost: you lose 14%, 11%, 9%, 8%, 7% of your maximum life every turn. This can kill you.

If you're lucky, this will take everything you've got.
value.name: Self-Destruction

value.info_text:
Any direct damage that exceeds 29%, 22%, 18%, 16%, 15% of your maximum life has the excess damage converted to a shallow wound that bleeds over the next 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns. This bleed cannot be resisted or removed, but can be reduced by Bloodstained. Extremely powerful hits (more than 40% of your max life) are not fully converted.

You can't just die. That would be too easy.
value.name: Self-Judgement

value.name: Focus Shadows

value2.info_text:
Focus your shadows on a single target. Friendly targets will be defended for 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns. Hostile targets will be attacked, with a 47%, 66%, 75%, 80%, 84% chance the shadows will blindside the target.

If you have less than maximum shadows available, they will automatically be summoned before focusing.

This talent has no cost.
value2.name: Focus Shadows

value.info_text:
You slash wildly at your target for 126%, 130%, 134%, 138%, 141% (at 0 Hate) to 188%, 201%, 214%, 227%, 239% (at 100+ Hate) damage.

At level 3, any wound you inflict with this carries a part of your curse, reducing the effectiveness of healing by 27%, 27%, 33%, 39%, 44% for 15 turns. The effect will stack.

The damage multiplier increases with your Strength.

This talent will also attack with your shield, if you have one equipped.
value.name: Slash

value2.info_text:
You slash wildly at your target for 126%, 130%, 134%, 138%, 141% (at 0 Hate) to 188%, 201%, 214%, 227%, 239% (at 100+ Hate) damage.

At level 3, any wound you inflict with this carries a part of your curse, reducing the effectiveness of healing by 25%, 25%, 32%, 39%, 45% for 15 turns. The effect will stack.

The damage multiplier increases with your Strength.

This talent will also attack with your shield, if you have one equipped.
value2.name: Slash

value.info_text:
While active, every swing of your weapon strikes strikes other adjacent enemies for 28%, 43%, 53%, 61%, 67% (at 0 hate) to 43%, 61%, 72%, 79%, 85% (at 100 hate) physical damage. The recklessness of your attacks brings you bad luck (luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

Cleave will deal 25% additional damage while using a two-handed weapon.

The Cleave damage increases with your Strength.
value.name: Cleave

value2.info_text:
While active, every swing of your weapon strikes strikes other adjacent enemies for 32%, 49%, 59%, 66%, 70% (at 0 hate) to 49%, 66%, 74%, 79%, 83% (at 100 hate) physical damage. The recklessness of your attacks brings you bad luck (luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

Cleave will deal 25% additional damage while using a two-handed weapon.

The Cleave damage increases with your Strength.
value2.name: Cleave

value.info_text:
Turn your attention to a nearby foe, and dominate them with your overwhelming presence. If the target fails to save versus your Mindpower, it will be unable to move for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns and vulnerable to attacks. They will lose 13, 17, 20, 22, 24 Armour, 19, 24, 29, 32, 36 Defense and your attacks will gain 24%, 32%, 38%, 42%, 46% resistance penetration. If the target is adjacent to you, your domination will include a melee attack.

Effects will improve with your Willpower.

This talent will also attack with your shield, if you have one equipped.
value.name: Dominate

value2.info_text:
Turn your attention to a nearby foe, and dominate them with your overwhelming presence. If the target fails to save versus your Mindpower, it will be unable to move for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns and vulnerable to attacks. They will lose 13, 17, 20, 22, 24 Armour, 19, 24, 29, 32, 36 Defense and your attacks will gain 41%, 48%, 52%, 55%, 57% resistance penetration. If the target is adjacent to you, your domination will include a melee attack.

Effects will improve with your Willpower.

This talent will also attack with your shield, if you have one equipped.
value2.name: Dominate

value.info_text:
You harness the chaos created by high insanity.

Each time you trigger an insanity chaotic effect with a power higher than 24, 16, 12, 10, 9 or lower than -24, -16, -12, -10, -9 you gain a chaos orb for 10 turns (this effect can only happen once per turn).

Each orb increases your damage by 3% and can stack up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7.
value.name: Chaos Orbs

value2.info_text:
You harness the chaos created by high insanity.

Each time you trigger an insanity chaotic effect with a power higher than 20, 12, 10, 8, 8 or lower than -20, -12, -10, -8, -8 you gain a chaos orb for 10 turns (this effect can only happen once per turn).

Each orb increases your damage by 3% and can stack up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7.
value2.name: Chaos Orbs

value.info_text:
You consume the chaotic forces of 2 chaos orbs, randomly teleporting you in a general direction up to 8 tiles away.

You will always travel at least 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 tiles away if possible.
value.name: Anarchic Walk

value2.info_text:
You consume the chaotic forces of 2 chaos orbs, randomly teleporting you in a general direction up to 8 tiles away.

You will always travel at least 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 tiles away if possible.
value2.name: Anarchic Walk

value.info_text:
You trigger an explosion of your chaos orbs on a target.

The orbs do no damage but confuse it for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns with a confusion power of 10% per orb.

Your effective spellpower used to overcome the target's mental save is also increased by 10% per orb.

All your orbs are always spent.
value.name: Disjointed Mind

value2.info_text:
You trigger an explosion of your chaos orbs on a target.

The orbs do no damage but confuse it for 5, 7, 9, 10, 10 turns with a confusion power of 10% per orb.

Your effective spellpower used to overcome the target's mental save is also increased by 10% per orb.

All your orbs are always spent.
value2.name: Disjointed Mind

value.info_text:
You lean to alter chaotic forces to your advantage.

Your maximum negative insanity effect is reduced from 50% to 50%, 41%, 35%, 31%, 28%.

You may activate this talent to consume any Chaos Orbs you have, gaining 10 insanity per orb.
value.name: Controlled Chaos

value2.info_text:
You lean to alter chaotic forces to your advantage.

Your maximum negative insanity effect is reduced from 50% to 47%, 36%, 31%, 28%, 26%.

You may activate this talent to consume any Chaos Orbs you have, gaining 10 insanity per orb.
value2.name: Controlled Chaos

value.info_text:
Each time you apply Jinx to an enemy, you have a 40%, 52%, 60%, 65%, 70% chance to siphon some of their luck for yourself for 5 turns. This stacks up to 10 times, increasing saves and defense by 1.00, 2.00, 2.00, 3.00, 3.00 and critical strike chance by 1.00%, 1.00%, 1.50%, 1.50%, 2.00%.

If you know Preordain, stacks beyond 6 also grant a 2%, 3%, 3%, 4%, 5% chance for you to entirely avoid damage taken.
value.name: Luckdrinker

value2.info_text:
Each time you apply Jinx to an enemy, you have a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance to siphon some of their luck for yourself for 5 turns. This stacks up to 10 times, increasing saves and defense by 1.00, 2.00, 2.00, 3.00, 3.00 and critical strike chance by 1.00%, 1.00%, 1.50%, 1.50%, 2.00%.

If you know Preordain, stacks beyond 6 also grant a 2%, 3%, 3%, 4%, 5% chance for you to entirely avoid damage taken.
value2.name: Luckdrinker

value.info_text:
You form a link between yourself and the chosen target for 4, 6, 7, 9, 10 turns, tying your fates together. If during this time you receive fatal damage, you reflexively warp reality, ending the effect and attempting to force them to die in your place.

As long as your target remains alive this redirects all damage you take to it as temporal and darkness damage for 1 turn.

Any Fortune stacks you have and any Jinx stacks the enemy have will then be consumed to heal you for 9, 15, 20, 25, 28 life per stack.
value.name: Fatebreaker

value2.info_text:
You form a link between yourself and the chosen target for 4, 6, 7, 9, 10 turns, tying your fates together. If during this time you receive fatal damage, you reflexively warp reality, ending the effect and attempting to force them to die in your place.

As long as your target remains alive this redirects all damage you take to it as temporal and darkness damage for 1 turn.

Any Fortune stacks you have and any Jinx stacks the enemy have will then be consumed to heal you for 9, 15, 20, 25, 28 life per stack.
value2.name: Fatebreaker

value.info_text:
You are surrounded by a vortex of entropic energy that feeds on the timelines of others. Each time you cast a spell random targets in radius 10 begin rapidly aging and decaying, reducing all stats by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 for 8 turns, stacking up to 10 times.

Up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 stacks total will be applied to enemies each cast with a max of 2 stacks on the same target.
value.name: Atrophy

value2.info_text:
You are surrounded by a vortex of entropic energy that feeds on the timelines of others. Each time you cast a spell random targets in radius 10 begin rapidly aging and decaying, reducing all stats by 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 for 8 turns, stacking up to 10 times.

Up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 stacks total will be applied to enemies each cast with a max of 2 stacks on the same target.
value2.name: Atrophy

value.info_text: On applying atrophy to a target below 15% of their maximum life you will sever their lifeline, slaying them instantly. You will then feast on the remnants of their timeline for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns, increasing your life regeneration by 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 and causing talents without fixed cooldowns to refresh twice as fast.
value.name: Severed Threads

value2.info_text: On applying atrophy to a target below 15% of their maximum life you will sever their lifeline, slaying them instantly. You will then feast on the remnants of their timeline for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, increasing your life regeneration by 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 and causing talents without fixed cooldowns to refresh twice as fast.
value2.name: Severed Threads

value.info_text:
You drink deeper from the timeline of others. Each time you apply atrophy you gain 0.8%, 1.2%, 1.5%, 1.8%, 2.0% spell speed per atrophy stack on the target and cause them to lose 2%, 4%, 5%, 5%, 6% of a turn.

The highest atrophy stack found will be used for the spell speed calculation.
value.name: Temporal Feast

value2.info_text:
You drink deeper from the timeline of others. Each time you apply atrophy you gain 0.8%, 1.2%, 1.5%, 1.8%, 2.0% spell speed per atrophy stack on the target and cause them to lose 3%, 4%, 5%, 6%, 7% of a turn.

The highest atrophy stack found will be used for the spell speed calculation.
value2.name: Temporal Feast

value.info_text:
You use your bond with horrors to summon three decaying devourers for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The decaying horrors cannot move and will attack all hostile creatures around them. They possess the talents Bloodbath, Gnashing Teeth and Frenzied Bite.

All its primary stats will be set to 10, 25, 50, 75, 100 (based on your Magic stat), life rating increased by 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, and all talent levels set to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6. Many other stats will scale with level.

Your increased damage, damage penetration, critical strike chance, and critical strike multiplier stats will all be inherited.
value.name: Decayed Devourers

value2.info_text:
You use your bond with horrors to summon three decaying devourers for 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns.

The decaying horrors cannot move and will attack all hostile creatures around them. They possess the talents Bloodbath, Gnashing Teeth and Frenzied Bite.

All its primary stats will be set to 10, 25, 50, 75, 100 (based on your Magic stat), life rating increased by 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, and all talent levels set to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6. Many other stats will scale with level.

Your increased damage, damage penetration, critical strike chance, and critical strike multiplier stats will all be inherited.
value2.name: Decayed Devourers

value.info_text:
You use your bond with horrors to summon a decaying bloated horror for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The decaying horror cannot move and will attack all hostile creatures in range of it. It possesses the talents Mind Disruption and Mind Sear.

All its primary stats will be set to 10, 25, 50, 75, 100 (based on your Magic stat), life rating increased by 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, and all talent levels set to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6. Many other stats will scale with level.

Your increased damage, damage penetration, critical strike chance, and critical strike multiplier stats will all be inherited.
value.name: Decayed Bloated Horror

All its primary stats will be set to 10, 25, 50, 75, 100 (based on your Magic stat), life rating increased by 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, and all talent levels set to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6. Many other stats will scale with level.

Your increased damage, damage penetration, critical strike chance, and critical strike multiplier stats will all be inherited.
value2.name: Decayed Bloated Horror

value.info_text:
Your tongue turns into a diseased tentacle that you use to lick enemies in a cone.

Licked creatures take 100% tentacle damage that ignores armor and get sick, gaining a random disease for 6 turns that deals 24, 30, 36, 40, 44 blight damage per turn and reduces strength, dexterity or constitution by 17, 23, 28, 32, 36.

If at least one enemy is hit you gain 10 insanity.

Disease damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Diseased Tongue

value2.info_text:
Your tongue turns into a diseased tentacle that you use to lick enemies in a cone.

Licked creatures take 100% tentacle damage that ignores armor and get sick, gaining a random disease for 6 turns that deals 24, 30, 36, 40, 44 blight damage per turn and reduces strength, dexterity or constitution by 17, 23, 28, 32, 36.

If at least one enemy is hit you gain 10 insanity.

Disease damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Diseased Tongue

value.info_text:
For a brief moment horrific hairs grow on your head, each of them ending with a creepy eye.

You use those eyes to gaze upon a target area, creatures caught inside partially turn to stone reducing their movement speed by 10%, 43%, 57%, 65%, 70% and making them brittle for 7 turns.

Brittle targets have a 35% chance for any damage they take to be increased by 33%, 44%, 53%, 61%, 67%.

This cannot be saved against.
value.name: Writhing Hairs

value2.info_text:
For a brief moment horrific hairs grow on your head, each of them ending with a creepy eye.

You use those eyes to gaze upon a target area, creatures caught inside partially turn to stone reducing their movement speed by 31%, 59%, 66%, 70%, 72% and making them brittle for 7 turns.

Brittle targets have a 35% chance for any damage they take to be increased by 33%, 44%, 53%, 61%, 67%.

This cannot be saved against.
value2.name: Writhing Hairs

value.info_text:
Your knowledge of entropy allows you to defy the laws of physics, allowing you to better endure your entropic energies.

You take 45%, 61%, 73%, 80%, 80% less damage from your entropic backlash.

You may activate this talent to instantly remove your current Entropy.
value.name: Reverse Entropy

value2.info_text:
Your knowledge of entropy allows you to defy the laws of physics, allowing you to better endure your entropic energies.

You take 45%, 61%, 73%, 80%, 80% less damage from your entropic backlash.

You may activate this talent to instantly remove your current Entropy.
value2.name: Reverse Entropy

value.info_text:
On casting Entropic Gift, a radius 1 rift in spacetime will be opened underneath the target for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns, increasing in radius by 1 each turn to a maximum of 0, 1, 2, 2, 2.

All caught within the rift are pulled towards the center and take 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 darkness and 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 temporal damage, plus 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% of your total entropy each turn (currently 0).
value.name: Black Hole

value2.info_text:
On casting Entropic Gift, a radius 1 rift in spacetime will be opened underneath the target for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns, increasing in radius by 1 each turn to a maximum of 1, 2, 2, 3, 3.

All caught within the rift are pulled towards the center and take 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 darkness and 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 temporal damage, plus 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% of your total entropy each turn (currently 0).
value2.name: Black Hole

value.info_text:
You and your Worm that Walks both teleport to an enemy in range 10 and make a melee attack for 100%, 113%, 122%, 131%, 138% damage.

Your Worm that Walks' Blindside talent cooldown is reduced by 0, 2, 2, 3, 3.
value.name: Foul Convergence

value2.info_text:
You and your Worm that Walks both teleport to an enemy in range 10 and make a melee attack for 100%, 113%, 122%, 131%, 138% damage.

Your Worm that Walks' Blindside talent cooldown is reduced by 1, 2, 3, 3, 3.
value2.name: Foul Convergence

value.info_text:
While within range 3 of your Worm that Walks you can project an aura of terror.

At the sight of two maddening horrors fighting together all your foes in radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 must make a physical save against your spellpower or be stunned for 2, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Additionally your Shared Insanity effect will cause enemies in radius 3 to lose 35, 47, 57, 65, 73 spell save and 35, 47, 57, 65, 73 defense for 3 turns.
value.name: Terrible Sight

value2.info_text:
While within range 3 of your Worm that Walks you can project an aura of terror.

At the sight of two maddening horrors fighting together all your foes in radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 must make a physical save against your spellpower or be stunned for 3, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns.

Additionally your Shared Insanity effect will cause enemies in radius 3 to lose 35, 47, 57, 65, 73 spell save and 35, 47, 57, 65, 73 defense for 3 turns.
value2.name: Terrible Sight

value.info_text:
Each time your shed skin looses 45%, 33%, 26%, 22%, 20% of its max power or you take damage over 15% of your maximum life a black putrescent pustule grows on your body for 5 turns.

Each pustule increases all your resistances by 4%, 5%, 6%, 6%, 7%. You can have up to 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 pustules at once.

Resistance scales with your Spellpower.
value.name: Pustulent Growth

value2.info_text:
Each time your shed skin looses 39%, 27%, 22%, 19%, 17% of its max power or you take damage over 15% of your maximum life a black putrescent pustule grows on your body for 5 turns.

Each pustule increases all your resistances by 4%, 5%, 6%, 6%, 7%. You can have up to 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 pustules at once.

Resistance scales with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Pustulent Growth

value.info_text: You make all your putrescent pustules explode at once, splashing all creatures in radius 1, 3, 3, 4, 4 with black fluids that deal 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage per pustule and healing you for 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 per pustule.
value.name: Pustulent Fulmination

value2.info_text: You make all your putrescent pustules explode at once, splashing all creatures in radius 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 with black fluids that deal 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage per pustule and healing you for 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 per pustule.
value2.name: Pustulent Fulmination

value.info_text:
Each time an enemy takes damage from Dark Whispers, there is a 10% chance for one of their visions to manifest in an adjacent tile for 3 turns. This vision takes no actions but the victim will deal 14%, 25%, 30%, 33%, 35% reduced damage to all other targets until the vision is slain.

A target cannot have more than one hallucination at a time.
value.name: Hideous Visions

value2.info_text:
Each time an enemy takes damage from Dark Whispers, there is a 10% chance for one of their visions to manifest in an adjacent tile for 3 turns. This vision takes no actions but the victim will deal 20%, 30%, 33%, 35%, 36% reduced damage to all other targets until the vision is slain.

A target cannot have more than one hallucination at a time.
value2.name: Hideous Visions

value.info_text:
Each time you cast a non-instant Demented spell, a nether spark begins orbiting around you for 10 turns, to a maximum of 5. Each spark increases your critical strike chance by 2%, and on reaching 5 sparks your next Nether spell will consume all sparks to empower itself:

Netherblast: Becomes a deadly lance of void energy, piercing through enemies and dealing an additional 111%, 149%, 178%, 203%, 225% damage over 5 turns.

Rift Cutter: Those in the rift will be pinned for 2, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, take 79, 108, 129, 148, 164 temporal damage each turn, and the rift explosion has 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 increased radius.

Spatial Distortion: An Entropic Maw will be summoned at the rift's exit for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns, pulling in and taunting nearby targets with it's tendrils.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower. Entropic Maw stats will increase with level and your Magic stat.
value.name: Halo of Ruin

value2.info_text:
Each time you cast a non-instant Demented spell, a nether spark begins orbiting around you for 10 turns, to a maximum of 5. Each spark increases your critical strike chance by 2%, and on reaching 5 sparks your next Nether spell will consume all sparks to empower itself:

Netherblast: Becomes a deadly lance of void energy, piercing through enemies and dealing an additional 111%, 149%, 178%, 203%, 225% damage over 5 turns.

Rift Cutter: Those in the rift will be pinned for 3, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns, take 79, 108, 129, 148, 164 temporal damage each turn, and the rift explosion has 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 increased radius.

Spatial Distortion: An Entropic Maw will be summoned at the rift's exit for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns, pulling in and taunting nearby targets with it's tendrils.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower. Entropic Maw stats will increase with level and your Magic stat.
value2.name: Halo of Ruin

value.info_text: Your entropy bleeds into the world around you. On having entropic backlash applied or increased to you, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 random enemies you can see within radius 10 will be shrouded in entropic forces for 8 turns. This increases the duration of new negative effects and reduces the duration of new beneficial effects applied to the target by 10%, 24%, 32%, 36%, 40%.
value.name: Nihil

value2.info_text: Your entropy bleeds into the world around you. On having entropic backlash applied or increased to you, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 random enemies you can see within radius 10 will be shrouded in entropic forces for 8 turns. This increases the duration of new negative effects and reduces the duration of new beneficial effects applied to the target by 17%, 31%, 37%, 40%, 42%.
value2.name: Nihil

value.info_text:
Your Nihil unravels the existence of the target, tearing them apart with entropy.

If 6 negative magical effects are applied before Nihil expires a Herald of Oblivion will be summoned to assist you for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Currently existing debuffs, Spellshocked, and Seen by Arcane Eye will not count towards this total. Refreshing the same debuff is counted.

The Herald will have a bonus to all attributes equal to your Magic. Many other stats will scale with level.

Your increased damage, damage penetration, critical strike chance, and critical strike multiplier stats will all be inherited.
value.name: Unravel Existence

value.info_text:
Summon a radius 4 storm of all-consuming oblivion at the targeted location for 3, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, reducing those within to nothing. Targets within will take 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage and 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 temporal damage each turn. Walls and other terrain within the storm will be disintegrated.

Each time the storm deals damage enemies will have any detrimental magical effect with less than 3 duration set to 3 duration, and all enemy projectiles will be destroyed.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
You trigger a cascade of rapidly mutating cells in your body for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Your body grows much bigger, gaining 2 size categories, making you able to walk through walls and increasing all your damage by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% and all your resistances by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35%.

Each time you take a step your monstrous form causes a small quake destroying and rearranging nearby terrain.
value.name: Overgrowth

The sheer power of your entropy tears holes through spacetime, opening this world to the void.

On casting a Demented spell you have a 30% chance of creating a void rift lasting 1, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns in a nearby tile, which will launch void blasts each turn at a random enemy in range 7, dealing 13, 17, 21, 24, 26 darkness and 13, 17, 21, 24, 26 temporal damage.

For 5 turns your electrokinesis transcends your normal limits, increasing your Lightning damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and your Lightning resistance penetration by 12%, 16%, 18%, 20%, 22%.

The pounding forge of thought in your mind is released upon your surroundings. Each turn that you remain stationary, you'll strike the dreamforge, inflicting mind and burning damage on enemies around you.

At raw talent level 5 you will be able to reflexively block up to one attack per turn with a 5%, 11%, 18%, 24%, 29% chance, based on your cunning. Each trigger requires and uses 10 Psi.

This requires a telekinetically-wielded weapon.
value.name: Warding Weapon
