value.info_text:
Focus your will into a powerful thrust of your telekinetically-wielded weapon to impale your target and then viciously rip it free.

This deals 206%, 229%, 247%, 262%, 275% weapon damage and then causes the victim to bleed for 234, 317, 382, 437, 485 Physical damage over four turns.

At level 3 the thrust is so powerful that it has 29%, 58%, 71%, 79%, 84% chance to shatter a temporary damage shield if one exists.

The bleeding damage increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Impale

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
You create a psionic shield from your weapon that prevents you from ever taking blows that deal more than 94%, 88%, 82%, 76%, 70% of your maximum life and gives you 4%, 9%, 12%, 14%, 15% evasion.

In addition, each time you take a melee hit the attacker automatically takes revenge strike that deals 40%, 48%, 55%, 60%, 65% weapon damage as mind damage. (This effect can only happen once per turn)

If you do not have a two handed weapon equiped, but have it in your off set, you instantly automatically switch.
value.name: Force Shield

value2.info_text:
You create a psionic shield from your weapon that prevents you from ever taking blows that deal more than 94%, 88%, 82%, 76%, 70% of your maximum life and gives you 6%, 11%, 14%, 16%, 17% evasion.

In addition, each time you take a melee hit the attacker automatically takes revenge strike that deals 40%, 48%, 55%, 60%, 65% weapon damage as mind damage. (This effect can only happen once per turn)

value.info_text: You feed on the pain of all foes in sight. For each one of them with life under 80% you gain a stack of Sadist effect that increases your raw mindpower by 5, 10, 14, 16, 17.

value2.info_text: You feed on the pain of all foes in sight. For each one of them with life under 80% you gain a stack of Sadist effect that increases your raw mindpower by 7, 12, 16, 18, 19.

value.info_text:
As long as you have at least a stack of Sadist whenever you take damage you use 20, 16, 14, 13, 12 psi to harness your stacks of Sadist to divide the damage by your stacks + 1.

Each time this happens a random foe in sight with 80% or less life left will take a backlash of 40%, 58%, 68%, 75%, 80% of the absorbed damage as mind damage.

This effect can only happen once per turn and only triggers for hits over 10% of your max life.
value.name: Channel Pain

value2.info_text:

Each time this happens a random foe in sight with 80% or less life left will take a backlash of 47%, 66%, 75%, 80%, 84% of the absorbed damage as mind damage.

This effect can only happen once per turn and only triggers for hits over 10% of your max life.
value2.name: Channel Pain

value.info_text:

value.info_text:

These effects will be directly reflected in the appropriate talent descriptions.

The damage threshold bonus will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Sandman

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
Enter a sleeping target's dreams for 8, 10, 12, 13, 15 turns. While in the Dreamscape, you'll encounter the target's invulnerable sleeping form as well as dream projections that it will spawn every other turn to defend its mind.

Projections inflict 50% less damage than the original, unless the target has Lucid Dreamer active.

When the Dreamscape ends, for each projection destroyed, the target's life will be reduced by 10% and it will be brainlocked for one turn.

In the Dreamscape, your damage will be improved by 65%, 89%, 107%, 122%, 136%.

The damage bonus will improve with your Mindpower.
value.name: Dreamscape

value2.info_text:

Projections inflict 50% less damage than the original, unless the target has Lucid Dreamer active.

When the Dreamscape ends, for each projection destroyed, the target's life will be reduced by 10% and it will be brainlocked for one turn.

value.info_text:
You believe that your mind is the center of everything. Permanently increases the amount of psi you gain per level by 5 and reduces your life rating (affects life at level up) by 50% (one time only adjustment).

You also have learned to overcome damage with your mind alone, and convert 19%, 31%, 39%, 45%, 49% of all damage you receive into Psi damage and 19%, 31%, 39%, 45%, 49% of your healing and life regen now recovers Psi instead of life.

Converted Psi damage you take will be further reduced by 41%, 43%, 44%, 45%, 46% (2.4%, 12%, 25%, 34%, 39% from character level with the remainder further reduced by 3.0%, 5.8%, 7.9%, 9.6%, 11% from talent level).

The first talent point invested will also increase the amount of Psi you gain from Willpower by 0.5, but reduce the amount of life you gain from Constitution by 0.25.

The first talent point also increases your solipsism threshold by 20% (currently 0%), reducing your global speed by 1% for each percentage your current Psi falls below this threshold.
value.name: Solipsism

value.info_text:
For 5 turns your pyrokinesis transcends your normal limits, increasing your Fire and Cold damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and your Fire and Cold resistance penetration by 12%, 16%, 18%, 20%, 22%.

In addition:

The cooldowns of Thermal Shield, Thermal Leech, Thermal Aura, Thermal Strike and Pyrokinesis are reset.

Thermal Aura effects will have their radius increased by 1.

Your Thermal Shield will have 100% absorption efficiency and will absorb twice the normal amount of damage.

Pyrokinesis will inflict Flameshock.

Thermal Leech will reduce enemy damage by 19%, 31%, 39%, 45%, 49%.

Thermal Strike will have its secondary cold/freeze explode in radius 1.

The damage bonus and resistance penetration scale with your Mindpower.

You increase your damage by 10% + 1.0%, 2.3%, 3.9%, 5.0%, 6.0% per enemy you can see in line of sight of you (maximum 5 enemies, 15%, 22%, 29%, 35%, 40% bonus) for 3 turns.

The damage bonus will increase with your Constitution.
value2.name: Orcish Fury

value.info_text:
Orcs have been the prey of the other races for thousands of years, with or without justification. They have learnt to withstand things that would break weaker races.

When your life goes below 50% your sheer determination cleanses you of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 mental debuff(s) based on talent level and Willpower. This can only happen once every 12 turns.

Also increases physical save by 5, 9, 13, 16, 19.
value.name: Hold the Ground

value2.info_text:
Orcs have been the prey of the other races for thousands of years, with or without justification. They have learnt to withstand things that would break weaker races.

When your life goes below 50% your sheer determination cleanses you of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 mental debuff(s) based on talent level and Willpower. This can only happen once every 5, 9, 13, 16, 19 turns.

Also increases physical save by +12.
value2.name: Hold the Ground

value.info_text:
Orcs have seen countless battles, and won many of them.

You revel in the defeat of your foes, gaining 9%, 11%, 12%, 13%, 14% damage resistance for 2 turns each time you kill an enemy.

The resistance will scale with talent level and your Constitution.

Additionally, passively increase all damage penetration by 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 16%.
value.name: Skirmisher

value2.info_text:
Orcs have seen countless battles, and won many of them.

You revel in the defeat of your foes, gaining 9%, 11%, 12%, 13%, 14% damage resistance for 2 turns each time you kill an enemy.

The resistance will scale with talent level and your Constitution.

Additionally, passively increase all damage penetration by 8%, 12%, 13%, 15%, 15%.
value2.name: Skirmisher

value.info_text:
Call upon the will of all of the Orc Prides to survive this battle.

You remove up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 detrimental effect(s) then heal for 219, 270, 308, 340, 367 life.

The healing will increase with talent level and your Willpower.
value.name: Pride of the Orcs

value2.info_text:
Call upon the will of all of the Orc Prides to survive this battle.

You remove up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 detrimental effect(s) then heal for 219, 270, 308, 340, 367 life.

The healing will increase with talent level and your Willpower.
value2.name: Pride of the Orcs

value.info_text:
You try to bite off your foe with your head for 50%, 76%, 107%, 130%, 150% blight weapon damage.

If the target falls under 20% life you have 20%, 33%, 48%, 60%, 70% chances to outright kill it (bosses are immune).

Whenever you succesfully bite a foe you regenerate 3.0, 8.9, 16, 21, 25 life per turn for 5 turns.

Instant kill chances and regeneration increase with your Constitution stat and weapon damage increases with the highest of your Strength, Dexterity or Magic stat.
value.name: Take a Bite

value2.info_text:

If the target falls under 20% life you have 20%, 33%, 48%, 60%, 70% chances to outright kill it (bosses are immune).

Whenever you succesfully bite a foe you regenerate 3.0, 8.9, 16, 21, 25 life per turn for 5 turns.

Instant kill chances and regeneration increase with your Constitution stat and weapon damage increases with the highest of your Strength, Dexterity or Magic stat.
value2.name: Take a Bite

value.info_text:
Without the distraction of thoughts or self your body reacts faster and better to aggressions.

Increases global speed by 5%, 13%, 18%, 22%, 25%.

value2.info_text:
Without the distraction of thoughts or self your body reacts faster and better to aggressions.

Increases global speed by 8%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 27%.
value2.name: Ultra Instinct

value.info_text:
The parasite corruption seeps into your body, strengthening it.

Increases blight, darkness, temporal and acid resistances by 14%, 26%, 33%, 37%, 40% but decreases nature and light resistances by 4%, 8%, 11%, 12%, 13%.
value.name: Corrupting Influence

value2.info_text:
The parasite corruption seeps into your body, strengthening it.

value.info_text:
Creates a shell around you, absorbing 470, 555, 618, 670, 715 damage. Lasts for 10 turns.

The total damage the shield can absorb increases with your Constitution.
value.name: Horror Shell

value2.info_text:
Creates a shell around you, absorbing 475, 561, 624, 677, 722 damage. Lasts for 10 turns.

value.info_text:
Call upon the grace of the Eternals to increase your global speed by 10%, 20%, 31%, 40%, 47% for 5 turns.

The speed bonus will increase with your Dexterity or Magic (whichever is higher).
value.name: Grace of the Eternals

value2.info_text:
Call upon the grace of the Eternals to increase your global speed by 10%, 18%, 29%, 38%, 47% for 5 turns.

The speed bonus will increase with your Dexterity or Magic (whichever is higher).
value2.name: Grace of the Eternals

value.info_text:
As the only immortal race of Eyal, Shaloren have learnt over the long years to use their innate inner magic to protect themselves.

23%, 33%, 40%, 45%, 49% chance to become invisible (power 7, 12, 18, 22, 25) for 5 turns when hit by a blow doing at least 10% of your total life.
value.name: Secrets of the Eternals

value2.info_text:

23%, 32%, 39%, 45%, 50% chance to become invisible (power 7, 12, 18, 22, 25) for 5 turns when hit by a blow doing at least 10% of your total life.
value2.name: Secrets of the Eternals

value.info_text:
Call upon nature to regenerate your body for 12, 21, 36, 51, 66 life every turn and increase healing mod by 17%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% for 8 turns.

The life healed will increase with your Willpower or Constitution (whichever is higher).
value.name: Gift of the Woods

value2.info_text:

The life healed will increase with your Willpower or Constitution (whichever is higher).
value2.name: Gift of the Woods

value.info_text:
Thaloren are part of the wood; it shields them from corruption.

Increase disease immunity by 32%, 52%, 63%, 70%, 76%, blight resistance by 3.8%, 6.5%, 8.5%, 10%, 12%, and all resistances by 2.5%, 4.2%, 5.5%, 6.7%, 7.6%.
value.name: Guardian of the Wood

value2.info_text:
Thaloren are part of the wood; it shields them from corruption.

value2.name: Guardian of the Wood

value.info_text:
Nature is with the Thaloren; they can always feel the call of the woods.

Summons two elite Treants to your side for 8 turns.

The treants have a global resistance equal to your blight resistance and can stun, knockback, and taunt foes.

Your Willpower (10, 25, 50, 75, 100) will be added to all of their non-Magic primary stats and their talent levels will increase with your Nature's Pride talent level.

Your increased damage, damage penetration, and many other stats will be inherited.
value.name: Nature's Pride

value2.info_text:
Nature is with the Thaloren; they can always feel the call of the woods.

value2.name: Nature's Pride

value.info_text:
You summon your undead energies to instantly build up death momentum to its maximum possible charges.

The effect will only start to decrease after 4, 7, 9, 11, 12 turns.

In addition, the death momentum effect also grants +3%, +3%, +4%, +5%, +5% to all damage per charge.
value.name: Lifeless Rush

value2.info_text:
You summon your undead energies to instantly build up death momentum to its maximum possible charges.

The effect will only start to decrease after 4, 7, 9, 11, 12 turns.

In addition, the death momentum effect also grants +3%, +3%, +4%, +5%, +5% to all damage per charge.

value.info_text:
You send a wave of darkness at your foe, dealing 50, 104, 164, 211, 250 darkness damage.

The darkness will drain a part of its life essence (only works on living targets) to increase the duration before the next charge of death momentum is used by 6, 8, 10, 12, 13.

Only usable when you have the death momentum effect.

The damage scales with your Magic stat.
value.name: Essence Drain

value2.info_text:
You send a wave of darkness at your foe, dealing 50, 104, 164, 211, 250 darkness damage.

The darkness will drain a part of its life essence (only works on living targets) to increase the duration before the next charge of death momentum is used by 6, 8, 10, 12, 13.

Only usable when you have the death momentum effect.

The damage scales with your Magic stat.
value2.name: Essence Drain

value.info_text:
Shatter the mind of your victim, giving you full control of its actions for 5, 7, 10, 12, 14 turns (based on your Willpower).

When the effect ends, you pull out your mind and the victim's body collapses, dead.

Targets with ranks at or above rare must be below 80% of their maximum life to be controlled, will be invulnerable for the duration, and will break free of the effect without dying after 3 turns.

This effect cannot be saved against but checks instakill immunity.
value.name: Dominant Will

value2.info_text:
Shatter the mind of your victim, giving you full control of its actions for 5, 7, 10, 12, 14 turns (based on your Willpower).

When the effect ends, you pull out your mind and the victim's body collapses, dead.

Targets with ranks at or above rare must be below 80% of their maximum life to be controlled, will be invulnerable for the duration, and will break free of the effect without dying after 3 turns.

value.info_text:
Your mind becomes more attuned to the Way, and is shielded from outside effects.

Increase confusion and silence immunities by 25%, 39%, 49%, 55%, 61% and Mental Save by 6, 11, 16, 20, 24.
value.name: Unity

value2.info_text:
Your mind becomes more attuned to the Way, and is shielded from outside effects.

Increase confusion and silence immunities by 23%, 41%, 53%, 61%, 66% and Mental Save by 6, 11, 16, 20, 24.

value.info_text:
Yeeks live fast, think fast, and sacrifice fast for the Way.

Your global speed is increased by 5.0%, 8.9%, 12%, 16%, 18%.

If your life drops below 30% you gain 1.5 turns. This effect can only happen once every 41, 32, 28, 25, 24 turns.
value.name: Quickened

value2.info_text:
Yeeks live fast, think fast, and sacrifice fast for the Way.

Reach through the collective psionic gestalt of the yeeks, the Way, to call for immediate help.

Summons up to 3 yeek mindslayers to your side for 6 turns.

All their primary stats will be set to 61, 86, 107, 127, 146 (based on your Willpower and Talent Level).

Your increased damage, damage penetration, and many other stats will be inherited.
value.name: Wayist

value2.info_text:

value2.name: Wayist

value.info_text:
Your yeti is attuned to the cold climates.

For 5 turns all damage you deal has 30%, 35%, 41%, 46%, 50% chance to encase the target in an iceblock for 3 turns.

While Algid Rage is up you easily pierce through iceblocks, reducing the damage they absorb by 50%.

The bonus will increase with your Willpower.
value.name: Algid Rage

value2.info_text:
Your yeti is attuned to the cold climates.

For 5 turns all damage you deal has 30%, 35%, 41%, 46%, 50% chance to encase the target in an iceblock for 3 turns.

While Algid Rage is up you easily pierce through iceblocks, reducing the damage they absorb by 50%.

The bonus will increase with your Willpower.
value2.name: Algid Rage

value.info_text:
Your yeti's body is very resilient to detrimental effects.

Each time you are hit by a physical, magical, or mental detrimental effect your body reacts with a burst of healing.

This effect heals for 40, 57, 67, 74, 80 and can only occur up to 3 times per turn.

It increases with your Constitution stat.
value.name: Resilient Body

value2.info_text:
Your yeti's body is very resilient to detrimental effects.

Each time you are hit by a physical, magical, or mental detrimental effect your body reacts with a burst of healing.

This effect heals for 46, 64, 74, 80, 85 and can only occur up to 3 times per turn.

It increases with your Constitution stat.
value2.name: Resilient Body

value.info_text:
You willingly fry a few parts of your yeti's brain to trigger a huge psionic blast in cone of radius 5.

Any foes caught in the blast will suffer 50, 117, 193, 251, 300 mind damage and be confused (35% power) for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Constitution and the apply power will be the highest of your mind, spell, or physical power.
value.name: Mindwave

value2.info_text:
You willingly fry a few parts of your yeti's brain to trigger a huge psionic blast in cone of radius 5.

Any foes caught in the blast will suffer 50, 117, 193, 251, 300 mind damage and be confused (35% power) for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Constitution and the apply power will be the highest of your mind, spell, or physical power.
value2.name: Mindwave

value.info_text:
Minions are only tools. You may dispose of them… Violently.

Makes the targeted minion explode for 36%, 43%, 47%, 50%, 53% of its maximum life in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 as blight damage.

Beware! Don't get caught in the blast! (unless you know Dark Empthy: 0% chance to ignore damage)
value.name: Undead Explosion

value.info_text:
Combines 3 of your minions into a bone giant.

At level 1, it makes a bone giant.

At level 3, it makes a heavy bone giant.

At level 5, it makes an eternal bone giant.

At level 6, it has a 20% chance to produce a runed bone giant.

Only one bone giant can be active at any time.
value.name: Assemble

value.info_text:
Sacrifice a bone giant minion. Using its bones, you make a temporary shield around you that prevents any attacks from doing more than 21%, 19%, 17%, 16%, 15% of your total life.

The effect lasts 16, 20, 24, 26, 29 turns.
value.name: Sacrifice

value.info_text:
Each minion you summon has a chance to be a more advanced form of undead. Your chance for each type of minion is as follows:

Degenerated skeleton warrior: 46%, 27%, 14%, 4%, 0%

Skeleton warrior: 10%, 12%, 14%, 16%, 19%

Armoured skeleton warrior: 0%, 4%, 6%, 9%, 11%

Skeleton archer: 11%, 16%, 15%, 11%, 3%

Skeleton master archer: 0%, 2%, 4%, 6%, 7%

Skeleton mage: 5%, 7%, 8%, 10%, 11%

Ghoul: 17%, 13%, 8%, 5%, 2%

Ghast: 0%, 3%, 4%, 6%, 7%

Ghoulking: 0%, 1%, 4%, 6%, 8%

Vampire: 5%, 6%, 6%, 5%, 3%

Master vampire: 0%, 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%

Grave wight: 0%, 0%, 2%, 3%, 4%

Barrow wight: 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 4%

Dread: 0%, 2%, 3%, 5%, 6%

Lich: 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 4%
value.name: Minion Mastery

value.info_text:
While Acid Infusion is active, your bombs coat your golem in acid for 7, 9, 11, 13, 14 turns when they hit it.

While coated, any melee hit against your golem has a 42%, 54%, 62%, 69%, 73% chance to trigger a radius 4 cone of acid towards the attacker that does 0.0 Acid damage to all caught inside. (This can only happen once per turn.)

The effects increase with your talent level and with the Spellpower and damage modifiers of your golem.
value.name: Caustic Golem

value2.info_text:
While Acid Infusion is active, your bombs coat your golem in acid for 7, 9, 11, 13, 14 turns when they hit it.

While coated, any melee hit against your golem has a 41%, 54%, 62%, 68%, 72% chance to trigger a radius 4 cone of acid towards the attacker that does 0.0 Acid damage to all caught inside. (This can only happen once per turn.)

The effects increase with your talent level and with the Spellpower and damage modifiers of your golem.
value2.name: Caustic Golem

value.info_text:
A radius 3 pool of acid spawns at the target location, doing 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 Acid damage each turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

All creatures caught in the mire will also suffer a 19%, 31%, 39%, 45%, 49% slowness effect.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Caustic Mire

value2.info_text:
A radius 3 pool of acid spawns at the target location, doing 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 Acid damage each turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

All creatures caught in the mire will also suffer a 13%, 25%, 33%, 40%, 46% slowness effect.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Caustic Mire

value.info_text:
You activate a special mode of your golem, boosting its regeneration rate by 53, 69, 82, 92, 101 life per turn for 7 turns.

If your golem was dead, it is instantly brought back to life with 30%, 39%, 46%, 51%, 55% life.

While supercharged, your golem is enraged and deals 25% more damage.
value.name: Supercharge Golem

value2.info_text:
You activate a special mode of your golem, boosting its regeneration rate by 53, 69, 82, 92, 101 life per turn for 7 turns.

If your golem was dead, it is instantly brought back to life with 30%, 41%, 49%, 55%, 60% life.

While supercharged, your golem is enraged and deals 25% more damage.
value2.name: Supercharge Golem

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with protective arcane forces.

Each time you receive a direct heal (not a life regeneration effect), you automatically gain a damage shield equal to 55%, 61%, 65%, 68%, 70% of the heal value for 3 turns.

This will replace an existing damage shield if the new shield value and duration would be greater than or equal to the old.

The shield value will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Arcane Shield

value2.info_text:
Surround yourself with protective arcane forces.

Each time you receive a direct heal (not a life regeneration effect), you automatically gain a damage shield equal to 55%, 61%, 64%, 67%, 69% of the heal value for 3 turns.

This will replace an existing damage shield if the new shield value and duration would be greater than or equal to the old.

The shield value will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Arcane Shield

value.info_text:
Infuse your body with untethered aether forces for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

While active, the cooldown for Arcane and Aether spells is divided by 3, your arcane damage and penetration is increased by 25%, your Disruption Shield radius is increased to 10, and your maximum mana is increased by 33%.

Using non arcane based spells in this state is hard and makes you lose 50 mana each time (up to once per turn).

Spells considered arcane for the purpose of not-losing mana are:
value.name: Aether Avatar

value2.info_text:
Infuse your body with untethered aether forces for 5, 7, 8, 9, 9 turns.

While active, the cooldown for Arcane and Aether spells is divided by 3, your arcane damage and penetration is increased by 25%, your Disruption Shield radius is increased to 10, and your maximum mana is increased by 33%.

Using non arcane based spells in this state is hard and makes you lose 50 mana each time (up to once per turn).

Spells considered arcane for the purpose of not-losing mana are:
value2.name: Aether Avatar

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with Pure Aether, increasing all your arcane damage by 3.4%, 6.2%, 8.4%, 10%, 12% and ignoring 10%, 27%, 36%, 42%, 46% arcane resistance of your targets.

At level 5 casting Aether Avatar removes up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 magical or physical detrimental effects.
value.name: Pure Aether

value2.info_text:
Surround yourself with Pure Aether, increasing all your arcane damage by 3.4%, 6.2%, 8.4%, 10%, 12% and ignoring 17%, 36%, 43%, 47%, 50% arcane resistance of your targets.

At level 5 casting Aether Avatar removes up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 magical or physical detrimental effects.
value2.name: Pure Aether

value.info_text:
You unleash the glorious vision of the past when the continent was filled with death and plagues.

All foes in range 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 catch a dire plague for 5 turns, dealing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage each turn.

The Dire Plague is considered a disease but is not prevented by disease immunity.

Every turn there is a 2%, 4%, 5%, 7%, 8% chance of a piece of the soul to be ripped away, increasing your souls by 1.
value.name: Dire Plague

value.info_text:
You call upon an eerie night to aid you for 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.

Each turn you automatically fire a beam of darkness towards a random foe (prioritizing the ones further away) that deals 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 darkness damage and has 25% chance to blind any foes caught inside for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Crepuscule

value.info_text:
Whenever one of your Dire Plague rips a soul it feels the inescapable coming of the end.

When this happens the darkness damage of the plague is a critical hit and all Dire Plagues in radius 1, 4, 7, 9, 11 around it (including itself) have their durations increased by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The duration increase may happen only once per turn.

If Crepuscule is currently active it fires an additional free beam at the target.

In addition the chance to rip a soul by Dire Plague increases by 35%, 54%, 69%, 81%, 92%.
value.name: The End of All Hope

value.info_text:
You recall the age long gone where necromancers had free reign over the world.

Increases all saves by 15, 32, 45, 56, 66, confusion and teleport resistances by 19%, 31%, 39%, 45%, 49%.

At level 5 any time you cross the 1 life threshold you become invulnerable for 1 turns.
value.name: Golden Age of Necromancy

value.info_text:
Each time you or your undead minions deal damage to a creature you apply Soul Leech to them.

If a creature dies with this effect active, you steal its soul.

Strong creatures and bosses are so overflowing with soul power that you steal a fragment of their soul every few turns:

- rare: at most every 30, 20, 15, 11, 9 turns

- unique: at most every 22, 15, 11, 9, 7 turns

- boss: at most every 13, 9, 7, 5, 4 turns

- elite boss: at most every 10, 7, 5, 4, 3 turns

Also increases your maximum souls capacity by 2, 4, 6, 8, 9 .
value.name: Soul Leech

value.info_text:
Your hunger for souls grows ever more. When you kill a creature you rip away its animus with great force, granting you a 34%, 63%, 74%, 80%, 84% chance to gain one additional soul.

In addition you are able to store 2, 4, 6, 8, 9 more souls.
value.name: Animus Hoarder

value.info_text:
Try to crush the soul of your foe, doing 227, 308, 371, 424, 471 darkness damage (that can never kill the target).

If the target is left with less than 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28% life you try to take control of its body.

Should this succeed the target becomes your permanent minion (unaffected by your aura) and you regain 2 souls.

Husks prossess the same abilities as they had in life (affected by Dark Empathy), are healed to full when created but can never heal or be healed by any means.

Only one husk can be controlled at any time, if this spell is cast again it will dispell the previous husk, even if no new one is created.

Bosses, other undeads and summoned creatures can not be turned into husks.

The damage and chance will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Animus Purge

value.info_text:
Crush and consume two souls to empower your next 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 spells, granting them a special effect.

Affected spells are:

  • Undeath Link: in addition to the heal a shield is created for half the heal power
  • Create Minions: allows you to summon 2 more minions
  • Assemble: allows you to summon a second bone golem
  • Invoke Darkness: becomes a cone of darkness
  • Shadow Tunnel: teleported minions will also be healed for 30% of their max life
  • Cold Flames: freeze chance increased to 100%
  • Freeze: becomes a ball of radius 2 and makes all targets wet
  • Consume Soul: effect increased by 50%
value.name: Essence of the Dead

value.info_text:
Consume a soul whole to rebuild your body, healing you for 333, 445, 531, 605, 670 and generating 131, 174, 207, 235, 260 mana.

If used below 1 life the surge increases your spellpower by 18, 32, 42, 51, 58 for 10 turns.

The heal and mana increases with your Spellpower.
value.name: Consume Soul

value2.info_text:
Crush and consume one of your captured souls, healing you for 404, 534, 634, 720, 795 life and restoring 134, 178, 211, 240, 265 mana.

The life and mana healed will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Consume Soul

value.info_text:
Unleash dark forces to all foes in sight that are afflicted by Soul Leech, dealing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 frostdusk damage to them and tearing apart their souls.

This returns up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 souls to you (one for each foe hit).

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
value.name: Torture Souls

value.info_text:
You draw constant power from the souls you hold within your grasp.

If you hold at least 2, your mana regeneration is increased by 0.7, 1.7, 2.4, 3.0, 3.6 per turn.

If you hold at least 5, your spellpower is increased by 13, 24, 33, 41, 47.

If you hold at least 8, all your resistances are increased by 5, 6, 8, 9, 10.
value.name: Reaping

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with arcane forces, disrupting any attempts to harm you by creating a shield of pure aether which can absorb 313, 425, 511, 585, 650 damage.

In combat, the mental focus required to maintain and monitor the shield is too much and you let it run on its own. In this state once the shield power is depleted it will start using your mana to absorb hits, at a ratio of 0.95, 0.64, 0.49, 0.40, 0.35 mana per damage.

Whenever mana is used by the shield it stores a remnant of this energy (up to 200 max). When the shield is deactivated any stored energy is released in a radius 5 arcane storm that lasts 5 turns, dealing 20% of the total stored damage each turn.

Outside of combat the shield regenerates 10% of its power each turn and stored energy quickly dissipates.

Dropping below 50% mana or reaching max energy storage will automatically deactivate this talent.

The shield power improves with your Spellpower.

The maximum energy storage is based on your total mana (ignoring sustained spells), with a limit at 400, 697, 848, 939, 999 effective mana.

Current shield power: 0

Current stored energy: 0
value.name: Disruption Shield

value2.info_text:
Surround yourself with arcane forces, disrupting any attempts to harm you by creating a shield of pure aether which can absorb 313, 425, 511, 585, 650 damage.

In combat, the mental focus required to maintain and monitor the shield is too much and you let it run on its own. In this state once the shield power is depleted it will start using your mana to absorb hits, at a ratio of 0.91, 0.58, 0.45, 0.39, 0.35 mana per damage.

Whenever mana is used by the shield it stores a remnant of this energy (up to 200 max). When the shield is deactivated any stored energy is released in a radius 5 arcane storm that lasts 5 turns, dealing 20% of the total stored damage each turn.

Outside of combat the shield regenerates 10% of its power each turn and stored energy quickly dissipates.

Dropping below 50% mana or reaching max energy storage will automatically deactivate this talent.

The shield power improves with your Spellpower.

The maximum energy storage is based on your total mana (ignoring sustained spells), with a limit at 546, 836, 948, 1007, 1043 effective mana.

The minion takes 300% damage from that effect.

The damage redirected percent depends on your Spellpower.
value.name: Suffer For Me

value.info_text:
Call upon the battlefields of old, collecting bones, fusing them with souls, and forging them into skeletal minions.

Up to 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 skeleton warriors of level 45, 48, 50, 52, 53 are summoned, and up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 skeletons can be controlled at once.

At level 3 the summons become armoured skeletons warriors.

At level 5, for every 3 skeleton warriors, a skeleton mage or archer will also be created without costing any souls. If this makes you go over your skeleton limit, a normal skeleton will be removed and its soul refunded.

Skeleton minions come in fewer numbers than ghoul minions but are generally more durable.
value.name: Call of the Crypt

value.info_text:
Any time one of your skeleton or bone giant dies, it shatters in radius 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, making any foe bleed for 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 physical damage over 5 turns.

If any other skeleton or bone giant minion is in the radius it will pickup some of the bones to enhance itself, increasing maximum and current life by 41, 79, 108, 133, 155, armour by 7, 10, 13, 15, 17 and gain 8.33, 26, 40, 52, 62 physical melee retaliation for 20 turns.

This talent never works when you kill your own minions.
value.name: Shattered Remains

value.info_text:
Every army of undead minions needs its spearhead. To that end you combine 3 skeleton minions into a bone giant of level 45, 48, 50, 52, 53.

The minions used are selected from the weakest first, and a Lord of Skulls will never be used.

At level 3 an eternal bone giant is created instead.

At level 6 a heavy bone giant is created instead.

Only one bone giant may be active, and casting this spell while one already exists will destroy it and create a new one.

bone_giant.desc: A towering creature, made from the bones of dozens of dead bodies. It is covered by an unholy aura.
bone_giant.name: bone giant

e_bone_giant.desc: A towering creature, made from the bones of hundreds of dead bodies. It is covered by an unholy aura.
e_bone_giant.name: eternal bone giant

h_bone_giant.desc: A towering creature, made from the bones of hundreds of dead bodies. It is covered by an unholy aura.
h_bone_giant.name: heavy bone giant

value.name: Assemble

value.info_text:
Consume a soul to empower one of your skeleton, making it into a Lord of Skulls.

The Lord of Skulls gains 35, 54, 69, 81, 92 more life and is instantly healed to full.

There can be only one active Lord of Skulls, casting this spell on another skeleton removes the effect from the current one.

It also gains a new talent if high enough:

At level 2 Warriors learn Giant Leap, a powerful jump attack that deals damage and dazes on impact and frees the skeleton from any stun, daze and pin effects they may have

At level 3 Archers learn Vital Shot, a devastating attack that can stun and cripple their foes

At level 5 Mages learn Meteoric Crash, a destructive spell that crushes and burns foes in a big radius for multiple turns and stuns them

At level 6 Bone Giants learn You Shall Be My Weapon!, a massive attack that deals high damage, knockbacks foes and stuns them
value.name: Lord of Skulls

value.info_text:
You control dead matter around you, lyring in the ground, decaying.

When you enter combat and every 29, 19, 15, 13, 12 turns thereafter a ghoul of level 45, 48, 50, 52, 53 automatically raises to fight for you.

At level 3 you can forcefully activate this spell to summon up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 ghasts around you.

At level 5 every 4 summoned ghouls or ghasts a ghoulking is summoned for free.

Ghouls, ghasts and ghoulkings last for 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns.

Ghoul minions come in larger numbers than skeleton minions but are generally more frail and disposable.
value.name: Call of the Mausoleum

value.info_text:
Ghouls are nothing but mere tools to you, for 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns you render them bloated with dark forces.

Anytime a ghoul or ghast is hit it will explode in a messy splash of gore, dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 frostdusk damage to all foes in radius 2 of it.

Any creature caught in the blast also receives a random disease that deals 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 blight damage over 6 turns and reduces one attribute by 17, 23, 28, 32, 36.

Only one ghoul may explode per turn. The one with the least time left to live is always the first to do so.

The damage and disease power is increased by your Spellpower.
value.name: Corpse Explosion

value.info_text:
Shattering up to 1, 2, 2, 2, 3 ghouls or ghasts you create a putrescent swirling cloud of radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 that follows you around for 3 turns per dead ghoul plus one turn. Oldest ghouls are prioritized for destruction.

Any ghoul or ghast dying or expiring within this cloud increases its duration by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turn and every two absorbed ghoul/ghast your gain back one soul.

The cloud deals 56, 75, 91, 104, 115 frostdusk damage to any foes caught inside.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Putrescent Liquefaction

value.info_text:
Whenever you would be affected by a detrimental physical effect you instead transfer it instantly to one of your ghouls.

The ghoul dies from the process.

While under 1 life it also affects magical and mental effects.

At most 1, 3, 4, 6, 7 effects can be affected per turn.

Cross-tier effects are never affected.
value.name: Discarded Refuse

value.info_text: Reduces the cooldown of all spells by 6%, 13%, 20%, 26%, 30%.
value.name: Quicken Spells

value.info_text:
You learn to finely craft and tune your spells, reducing all their cooldowns by 6%, 13%, 20%, 26%, 30%.

In doing so you can also carve a hole in spells that affect an area to avoid damaging yourself. The chance of success is 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.

In addition, you hone your damaging spells to spellshock their targets. Whenever you deal damage with a spell you attempt to spellshock them with 55, 74, 89, 102, 114 more Spellpower than normal. Spellshocked targets suffer a temporary 20% penalty to damage resistances.
value.name: Spellcraft

value2.info_text:
You learn to finely craft and tune your offensive spells.

You try to carve a hole in spells that affect an area to avoid damaging yourself. The chance of success is 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.

In addition, you hone your damaging spells to spellshock their targets. Whenever you deal damage with a spell you attempt to spellshock them with 55, 74, 89, 102, 114 more Spellpower than normal. Spellshocked targets suffer a temporary 20% penalty to damage resistances.
value2.name: Spellcraft

value.info_text:
Your mastery over magic is so great that you can alter the energy of all damaging spells to suit your needs.

Whenever you deal damage with a spell you attune to the element of that spell for 6 turns, converting 37%, 60%, 78%, 93%, 100% of any damage you deal into that element.

This effect will not override itself and will only trigger from spells directly cast by you, not from damage over time or ground damage effects.
value.name: Energy Alteration

value.info_text:
Your mastery of arcane flows allow you to reset the cooldown of up to 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of your spells (that don't have a fixed cooldown) of tier 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 or less.

In addition for 2, 4, 5, 7, 8 turns you are overflowing with energy; all known spells are considered one talent level higher when casting them.
value.name: Metaflow

value2.info_text: Your mastery of arcane flows allow you to reset the cooldown of up to 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of your spells (that don't have a fixed cooldown) of tier 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 or less.
value2.name: Metaflow

value.info_text:
Fires powerful undead energies through your necrotic aura. For each recent death that happened inside your aura, you will raise an undead minion (up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 minions). These minions will be raised within a cone that extends to the edge of your necrotic aura.

The minions level is your level -5, -2, +0, +2, +3.

Each minion has a chance to be:

Degenerated skeleton warrior: 49%, 30%, 17%, 6%, 0%

Skeleton warrior: 10%, 14%, 17%, 21%, 26%

Armoured skeleton warrior: 0%, 4%, 8%, 12%, 16%

Skeleton archer: 12%, 18%, 19%, 15%, 5%

Skeleton master archer: 0%, 3%, 5%, 8%, 10%

Skeleton mage: 5%, 8%, 10%, 13%, 15%

Ghoul: 19%, 14%, 10%, 7%, 3%

Ghast: 0%, 3%, 5%, 8%, 10%

Ghoulking: 0%, 1%, 4%, 7%, 11%
value.name: Create Minions

value.info_text:
Your dark power radiates further as you grow stronger. Increases the radius of your necrotic aura by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, and reduces the decay rate of your minions outside the aura by 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5%.

At level 3, necrotic minions inside your aura have a 25% chance to refund their soul on death. If a minion turns into a will o' the wisp then the wisp will have that chance instead.
value.name: Aura Mastery

value.info_text:
A surge of power radiates to all your minions, increasing their Physical Power, Spellpower and Accuracy by 38, 52, 62, 71, 79, their Armour penetration by 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 and their critical hit chance by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32 for 6 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Surge of Undeath

value.info_text:
You share your powers with your minions, granting them 52%, 70%, 84%, 97%, 107% of your resistances and saves.

In addition all damage done by your minions to you or your other minions is reduced by 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Dark Empathy

value.info_text:
Your target's doom draws near. Its healing factor is reduced by 80%, and will take 116%, 122%, 126%, 128%, 130% of its remaining life (or 808, 1024, 1192, 1334, 1460, whichever is lower) over 10 turns as arcane damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Impending Doom

value.info_text:
Absorb up to 66%, 71%, 75%, 77%, 79% of the maximum life of each of your necrotic minions (even negative life, possibly destroying them). This will heal you for the greatest amount absorbed.

The healing will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Undeath Link

value.info_text:
This is your true goal and the purpose of all necromancy - to become a powerful and everliving Lich!

If you are killed while this spell is active, the arcane forces you unleash will be able to rebuild your body into the desired Lichform.

All liches gain the following intrinsics:

  • Poison, cut, and fear immunity.
  • 100% disease and stun resistance.
  • 20% cold and darkness resistance.
  • No need to breathe.
  • Infusions do not work.

Also:

  • At level 1: -3 to all stats, -10% to all resistances. Such meagre devotion!
  • At level 2: Nothing.
  • At level 3: +3 Magic and Willpower, +1 life rating (not retroactive).
  • At level 4: +3 Magic and Willpower, +2 life rating (not retroactive), +10 spell and mental saves, Celestial/Star Fury category (0.7) and 0.1 negative energies regeneration.
  • At level 5: +5 Magic and Willpower, +2 life rating (not retroactive), +10 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 10%, Celestial/Star Fury category (0.9) and 0.5 negative energy regeneration.
  • At level 6: +6 Magic, Willpower and Cunning, +3 life rating (not retroactive), +15 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 15%, Celestial/Star Fury category (1.1) and 1.0 negative energy regeneration.
  • At level 7: Your power becomes overwhelming! +12 Magic, Willpower and Cunning, 60% chance to ignore critical hits, +4 life rating (not retroactive), +35 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 15%, Celestial/Star Fury category (1.3) and 1.0 negative energy regeneration.

The undead cannot use this talent.

While active, it will drain 4 mana per turn.

Once you die and turn into a Lich you can not invest any more in this talent.
value.name: Lichform
require: Level 20, Mag 40; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 21, Mag 42; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 22, Mag 44; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 23, Mag 46; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 24, Mag 48; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead

value.info_text:
The line between life and death blurs for you.

You can only die when you reach -315, -409, -479, -536, -586 life but your maximum life is reduced by 158, 205, 240, 269, 294.

When you are below 1 life you gain 6%, 8%, 10%, 12%, 13% to all resistances.

The life amount is based on your Constitution attribute.
value.name: Blurred Mortality

value2.info_text: The line between life and death blurs for you; you can only die when you reach -63, -126, -189, -251, -314 life.
value2.name: Blurred Mortality

value.info_text:
As you learn to tiptoe across the veil of death you learn to master the dark forces.

Each time you cross the 1 life threshold you automatically unleash a blast of 177, 241, 289, 331, 367 frostdusk damage in radius 1, 3, 4, 5, 5.

For each creature that takes damage from the blast one of your talent's cooldown is reduced by 3, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Across the Veil

value.info_text:
As you continue to attune your body to undeath you reject nature as a whole.

As long as you have no natural infusion on your skin, each rune on it increases your minimum negative life by -10, -18, -25, -30, -35 and your spells critical chance by 1.1%, 1.4%, 1.6%, 1.8%, 2.0%.

Currently: effects disabled because of no rune
value.name: Runeskin

value.info_text:
Each turn you unleash dark powers through your runeskin.

For each rune you have a random foe in sight will be hit by a spike of decrepitude, dealing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 frostdusk damage.

A foe can only be hit by one spike per turn.

If your life is below 1, the spikes also reduce all damage done by the targets by 8%, 14%, 19%, 22%, 25%.
value.name: Spikes of Decrepitude

value.info_text:
Dark fumes erupt from the ground for 5 turns. Any creature entering the circle will receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness.

Only one bane can affect a creature.

Banes last for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns, and also deal 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 darkness damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Circle of Death

value.info_text:
Invoke a cone dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 darkness damage in a radius of 4, 5, 7, 8, 9. Any creatures caught inside must make check against their Mental Save or be knocked back 4 grids away.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Fear the Night

value.info_text:
Invoke a ball of darkness that deals 192, 260, 313, 357, 397 darkness damage in a radius of 1. Every creature hit will start to become closer to death, reducing their global speed by 8%, 16%, 25%, 33%, 42%.

Necrotic minions' damage against those creatures is increased by 28%, 35%, 40%, 45%, 48%.

The effects last for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

The damage done and the minions' damage increase will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Rigor Mortis

value.info_text:
Conjures up a beam of darkness, doing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 darkness damage.

At level 5, the beam widens to hit foes on each side.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Invoke Darkness

value2.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of darkness, doing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 darkness damage.

At level 3, it will create a beam of shadows.

At level 5, none of your Nightfall spells will hurt your minions.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Invoke Darkness

value.info_text:
Dark fumes erupt from the ground in radius 3, 3, 3, 4, 4 for 5 turns. Any creature entering the circle will receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness.

Only one bane can affect a creature.

Banes last for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns, and also deal 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 darkness damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Night Sphere

value.info_text:
Shadows engulf your foes, anytime you deal darkness damage to a creature affected by a bane, the bane's duration is increased by 1 turn and the shadows erupt, dealing an additional 34, 46, 56, 64, 71 darkness damage.

The damage can only happen once per turn per creature, the turn increase however always happens.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Erupting Shadows

value.info_text:
You summon a river of tortured souls to launch an onslaught of darkness against your foes.

Every turn for 5 turns you launch a projectile towards the designated area that explodes in radius 3, 3, 3, 4, 4, dealing 149, 202, 243, 278, 309 darkness damage.

Each projectile consumes a soul and the spell ends when it has sent 5 projectiles or when you have no more souls to use.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: River of Souls

value.info_text:
You reach out through the aether to all creatures in sight that were slowed by Reality Breach or Congeal Time.

For each target you create a link of arcane infused steam to it that lasts 5, 9, 12, 13, 15 turns.

Any time the target uses a talent one of your cooling down spells is reduced by 1 (prioritizing Technomancy spells).

Each turn the link is up the target and any creature inside the link takes 15, 20, 24, 28, 31 occult damage.

As long as at least one link is up, the cooldown of your Metaphasic Spin spell is set to 6 turns instead of 30.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Ethereal Steam

value2.info_text:
You reach out through the aether to all creatures in sight that were slowed by Reality Breach or Congeal Time.

For each target you create a link of arcane infused steam to it that lasts 7, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns.

Any time the target uses a talent one of your cooling down spells is reduced by 1 (prioritizing Technomancy spells).

Each turn the link is up the target and any creature inside the link takes 15, 20, 24, 28, 31 occult damage.

As long as at least one link is up, the cooldown of your Metaphasic Spin spell is set to 6 turns instead of 30.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Ethereal Steam

value.info_text:
Using your sheer arcane power you keep breaches in spacetime open for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

Each turn they are open you project an occult clone of your saw along each breach, damaging any creature caught for 78%, 94%, 106%, 116%, 125% occult weapon damage.

The saw cuts both in a physical and arcane way, reducing the duration of a random beneficial effect on each target by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 each time.

Each target can only be affected once per turn.

This spell is only usable for one turn after casting Reality Breach but any Reality Breach cast during its duration is also recorded inside.
value.name: Metaphasic Echoes

value2.info_text:
Using your sheer arcane power you keep breaches in spacetime open for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

Each turn you they are open you project an occult clone of your saw along each breach, damaging any creature caught for 78%, 94%, 106%, 116%, 125% occult weapon damage.

The saw cuts both in a physical and arcane way, reducing the duration of a random beneficial effect on each target by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 each time.

Each target can only be affected once per turn.

This spell is only usable for one turn after casting Reality Breach but any Reality Breach cast during its duration is also recorded inside.
value2.name: Metaphasic Echoes

value.info_text: Try to confuse the target's mind for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 (power 14%, 31%, 38%, 42%, 44%) turns.
value.name: Mind Disruption

value2.info_text: Try to confuse the target's mind for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 (power 25%, 39%, 43%, 45%, 46%) turns.
value2.name: Mind Disruption

value.info_text:
You take full control of your own shadow for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Your shadow possesses your talents and stats, has 56%, 62%, 66%, 69%, 72% life and deals 75%, 82%, 87%, 91%, 94% damage, -30% all resistances, -100% light resistance and +100% darkness resistance.

Your shadow is permanently stealthed (63, 79, 91, 101, 110 power), and all melee damage it deals is converted to darkness damage.

The shadow cannot teleport.

If you release control early or if it leaves your sight for too long, your shadow will dissipate.
value.name: Ambuscade

value2.info_text:
You take full control of your own shadow for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Your shadow possesses your talents and stats, has 56%, 62%, 66%, 68%, 70% life and deals 75%, 83%, 88%, 92%, 95% damage, -30% all resistances, -100% light resistance and +100% darkness resistance.

Your shadow is permanently stealthed (63, 79, 91, 101, 110 power), and all melee damage it deals is converted to darkness damage.

The shadow cannot teleport.

If you release control early or if it leaves your sight for too long, your shadow will dissipate.
value2.name: Ambuscade

value.info_text:
The caster's image blurs, granting a 16, 28, 37, 47, 55 bonus to Defense.

The bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Blur Sight

value.info_text:
Cold Flames slowly spread from 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 spots in a radius of 3 around the targeted location. The flames deal 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 cold damage, and have a chance of freezing.

Damage improves with your Spellpower.
value.name: Cold Flames

value.info_text: Reduces the cooldown of all spells by 6%, 13%, 20%, 26%, 30%.
value.name: Quicken Spells

value.info_text:
Emits a necrotic aura, sustaining your undead minions in a radius of 2. Minions outside the radius will lose 10% life per turn.

Any creature you or your minions kill within your aura will be absorbed as a soul that can be used to raise minions.

Retch from your ghouls will also heal you, even if you are not undead.
value.name: Necrotic Aura

value.info_text:
The husk self-destructs, destroying itself and generating a blast of shadows in a radius of 4, doing 60, 150, 300, 450, 550 darkness damage.

This spell is only usable when the husk's master is dead.
value.name: Self-destruction

value.info_text: Return to the location you used Ghost Walk from.
value.name: Ghost Walk - Return

value.info_text:
Bathes the target in flames doing 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 damage

The damage will increase with the Magic stat
value.name: Shadow Invoke Darkness

value.info_text:
Bathes the target in flames doing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 damage

The damage will increase with the Magic stat
value.name: Shadow Cold Touch

value.info_text:
Surround your minions in a veil of darkness. The darkness will teleport them to you, and grant them 58%, 72%, 82%, 91%, 99% evasion for 5 turns.

The evasion chance will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Shadow Tunnel

value.info_text:
Reaches through the shadows into quieter places, summoning 2, 3, 4, 6, 7 harmless creatures.

Those creatures are then cursed with a Curse of Hate, making all hostile foes try to kill them.

If the summoned creatures are killed by hostile foes, you have 70% chance to gain a soul.
value.name: Curse of the Meek

value.info_text:
Through the shadows, you forge a temporary copy of yourself, existing for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The copy possesses your exact talents and stats, has 56%, 62%, 65%, 68%, 70% life and deals 75%, 82%, 87%, 90%, 93% damage.
value.name: Forgery of Haze

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with Frostdusk, increasing all your darkness and cold damage by 3.4%, 6.2%, 8.4%, 10%, 12%, and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% of the darkness resistance of your targets.

In addition, all darkness damage you take heals you for 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57% of the damage.
value.name: Frostdusk

value.info_text:
The caster's image blurs, granting a 16, 28, 37, 47, 55 bonus to Defense.

The bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Blur Sight

value.info_text:
Creates a globe of pure light within a radius of 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 that illuminates the area and deals 142, 193, 232, 265, 294 damage to all creatures.

At level 3, it also blinds all who see it (except the caster) for 3, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.
value.name: Illuminate

value2.info_text:
Creates a globe of pure light within a radius of 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 that illuminates the area.

At level 3, it also blinds all who see it (except the caster) for 3, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

At level 4, it also deals 121, 164, 197, 226, 251 light damage.
value2.name: Illuminate

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with a phantasmal shield of pure light.

Whenever you would take damage there is 14%, 18%, 20%, 23%, 25% chance to become ethereal for an instant and fully ignore it.

If you do get hit, the shield glows brightly, sending triggering a flash of light on the attacker, dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 light damage in radius 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 around it and dazzling any affected creature (deal 10% less damage) for 5 turns. This can only happen every 14, 12, 10, 9, 9 turns.

The damage and ignore chance will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Phantasmal Shield

value2.info_text:
The caster is surrounded by a phantasmal shield granting 10% chance to evade weapon attacks. If hit in melee, the shield will deal 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 light damage to the attacker.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Phantasmal Shield

value.info_text:
Weave a net of arcane disturbances around your body, removing yourself from the sight of all, granting 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 bonus to invisibility for 7 turns.

While invisible all damage you deal against blinded or dazzled foes is increased by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% (additive with other damage increases).

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Invisibility

value2.info_text:
The caster fades from sight, granting 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 bonus to invisibility.

Beware — you should take off your light, or you will still be easily spotted.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality. All your damage is reduced by 70%.

This powerful spell constantly drains your mana (2 per turn) while active.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Invisibility

value.info_text:
Create a perfect lookalike of your own form made out of pure light near a creature.

This image has 6, 9, 11, 13, 14 life and can never take more than 1 damage per creature per turn and is immune to any non direct damage (ground effects, damage over time, …).

Whenever you cast a spell your mirror image will try to duplicate it at the same target for 66% less damage, if possible. If it can it will loose 1 life, if not it will instead taunt a creature to focus its attention on itself.

While the image exists you receive the damage bonus from the Invisibility spell as if you were invisible.

This spell can not be cast while a Mirror Image already exists and only in combat. It will disappear after a few turn when outside of combat.
value.name: Mirror Image

value.info_text:
You summon a Rime Wraith inside of you, an intangible creature, that haunts both foes and allies for 11, 14, 17, 20, 22 turns.

Every turn the wraith will select a new target and jump to it.

When the wraith enters a creature they are covered in hoarfrost for 3 turns:

  • if friendly: increases cold resistance by 12%, 18%, 24%, 30%, 34%, converts all damage done to cold and increases cold damage by 14%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 34%.
  • if hostile: reduces cold resistance by 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% and move 22%, 29%, 35%, 40%, 45% slower

When selecting a target the wraith prefers one that is not affected by hoarfrost if possible.
value.name: Rime Wraith

value.info_text:
When switching targets your rime wraith now always prefers the one farther away if possible.

Any creatures on the path of the wraith while it travels are affected:

  • if friendly: they are healed for 31, 43, 52, 59, 66
  • if hostile: they take 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 cold damage, because the wraith is inside the creature the damage fully ignores any damage shield

The damage and healing will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Frigid Plunge

value.info_text:
By crushing one more soul you reinforce your existing rime wraith, duplicating it out of its current host.

The new wraith will exist for 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns and cannot be used for another cast of Gelid Host.

When it is created the current host and all foes in radius 4 are blasted for 149, 202, 243, 278, 309 cold damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Gelid Host

value.info_text:
Hoarfrost now has additional effects:

  • if friendly: magical and physical saves increased by 12, 19, 25, 30, 35, at level 5 healing factor is also increased by 15%.
  • if hostile: magical and physical saves reduced by 12, 19, 25, 30, 35, at level 5 all talents cool down 15% slower.
value.name: Permafrost

value.info_text:
Taking on a spectral form, you teleport to the target tile within range 5, 6, 8, 9, 10.

For 3 turns after using this spell, you gain the ability to instantly teleport back to your original tile as long as you are within range of it.
value.name: Ghost Walk

value.info_text:
While in your spectral form from Ghost Walk and for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns afterwards, you gain vision of all enemies within radius 8, 8, 9, 10, 10.

In addition, at all times you gain the ability to sense undead within 11, 12, 13, 15, 16 tiles, and can perceive any foe within 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 tiles of your necrotic minions.
value.name: Spectral Sight

value.info_text: While in your spectral form from Ghost Walk and for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns afterwards, damage and detrimental effects have a 11%, 18%, 21%, 24%, 26% chance to harmlessly pass through you.
value.name: Intangibility

value.info_text: On using Ghost Walk - Return, you create a portal that summons 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 spirits around you for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. The spirits do very little damage, but taunt all enemies in radius 3 into attacking them.
value.name: Path to Beyond

value.info_text:
You root yourself into the earth, and transform your flesh into stone. While this spell is sustained, you may not move, and any forced movement will end the effect.

Your stone form and your affinity with the earth while the spell is active has the following effects:

  • Reduces the cooldown of Earthen Missiles, Pulverizing Auger, Earthquake, and Mudslide by 18%, 28%, 33%, 37%, 40%.
  • Grants 52%, 70%, 84%, 97%, 107% Fire Resistance, 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% Lightning Resistance, 12%, 16%, 20%, 22%, 25% Acid Resistance, and 13%, 26%, 39%, 52%, 65% Stun Resistance.

Resistances scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Body of Stone

You root yourself into the earth, and transform your flesh into stone. While this spell is sustained, you may not move, and any forced movement will end the effect.

Your stone form and your affinity with the earth while the spell is active has the following effects:

  • Reduces the cooldown of Earthen Missiles, Pulverizing Auger, Earthquake, and Mudslide by 19%, 28%, 33%, 36%, 38%.

Also raises your physical and magical saves by 6, 13, 19, 26, 32.
value.name: Crystalline Focus

  • Iron
  • Steel
  • Dwarven-steel
  • Stralite
  • Voratun
value2.name: Extract Gems

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with a Tempest, increasing all your lightning damage by 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%, 10% and ignoring 20%, 34%, 42%, 46%, 49% lightning resistance of your targets.

Your Lightning and Chain Lightning spells also gain a 11%, 23%, 35%, 46%, 58% chance to daze, and your Thunderstorm spell gains a 5%, 11%, 17%, 23%, 29% chance to daze.
value.name: Tempest

value2.info_text:
Surround yourself with a Tempest, increasing all your lightning damage by 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%, 10% and ignoring 25%, 41%, 47%, 50%, 52% lightning resistance of your targets.

Your Lightning and Chain Lightning spells also gain a 11%, 23%, 35%, 46%, 58% chance to daze, and your Thunderstorm spell gains a 5%, 11%, 17%, 23%, 29% chance to daze.

value.name: Essence of Speed

value2.info_text: Increases the caster's global speed by 8%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 26%.
value2.name: Essence of Speed

value.info_text:
Command a random spiderbot to jump onto your target at ramming speed. The impact destroys the bot (possibly triggering Cryogenic Digs).

This creates a radius 3 explosion dealing 263, 357, 429, 491, 545 terrene damage to all creatures while also freezing them for 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns and rendering them wet for 4, 8, 10, 12, 12 turns.

The cooldown of this spell is affected by Body of Stone.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Ramming Bot

value2.info_text:
Command a random spiderbot to jump onto your target at ramming speed. The impact destroys the bot (possibly triggering Cryogenic Digs).

This creates a radius 3 explosion dealing 263, 357, 429, 491, 545 terrene damage to all creatures while also freezing them for 3, 5, 6, 6, 6 turns and rendering them wet for 6, 10, 12, 13, 13 turns.

The cooldown of this spell is affected by Body of Stone.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Ramming Bot

value.info_text:
You create an orb attuned to thaumaturgy for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

While it lasts, any beam spell you cast will be duplicated and also cast for free at the orb for 45%, 58%, 66%, 71%, 75% of the normal damage.
value.name: Orb of Thaumaturgy

value.info_text:
Casting beam spells has become so instinctive for you that you can now easily weave in other spells at the same time.

Anytime you cast a beam spell there is a 15%, 20%, 24%, 27%, 30% chance to automatically cast an offensive spell that you know.

Beam spells duplicated by the Orb of Thaumaturgy can also trigger this effect.

This can only happen once (or twice with Orb of Thaumaturgy) per turn.

The additional cast will cost mana but no turn, will not active its cooldown and can trigger on spells currently on cooldown.

During Aether Avatar only compatible spells are used.

Eligible spells: Aether Beam [unknown], Aether Breach [unknown], Arcane Vortex [unknown], Blastwave [unknown], Chain Lightning [unknown], Earthen Missiles [unknown], Earthquake [unknown], Fireflash [unknown], Flameshock [unknown], Freeze [unknown], Frozen Ground [unknown], Glacial Vapour [unknown], Illuminate [unknown], Inferno [unknown], Mudslide [unknown], Nova [unknown], Shock [unknown], Tidal Wave [unknown]
value.name: Multicaster

value.info_text:
By weaving arcane triggers around you feet you can use the residual energies of your beam spells for free movement.

Each time you cast a beam spell you can move right afterwards without spending a turn.

This spell has 2, 4, 5, 7, 8 charges. Once all charges are spent it unsustains.

If you exit combat with some charges left it will after 10 turn regenerates its charges, if you have enough mana.
value.name: Slipstream

value.info_text:
Using your near-perfect knowledge of beam spells you combine them all into a powerful 3-wide beam of pure energy.

The beam deals 256, 347, 418, 477, 530 thaumic damage and always goes as far as possible.

Thaumic damage can never be resisted by anything but "Resistance: All", always uses your highest resistance penetration and highest damage type bonus and can never be altered into other damage types.

It can trigger Burning Wake and Hurricane.

It is affected by the wet status (+30% damage) if you are in Shivgoroth Form.

It has a 25% chance to either stun or freeze the targets for 3 turns (if Crystalline Focus or Uttercold are active, respectively).

Each time you deal damage with a beam spell, the remaining cooldown is reduced by 1 (this can happen only once per turn).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Elemental Array Burst

value.info_text:
When you stand in your Burning Wake or Inferno ground effect, you can self immolate to trigger Cleansing Flames for 8, 11, 14, 16, 18 turns.

While the effect lasts you will take 35, 48, 58, 66, 73 fire damage per turn.

Each turn there is a 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% chance for any creature taking damage from Burning Wake, Inferno or Cleansing Flames to remove a status effect (physical or magical).

If the target is hostile, it will remove a beneficial effect.

If the target is friendly, it will remove a detrimental effect.
value.name: Cleansing Flames

value2.info_text:
When your Burning Wake talent is active, your Inferno and Burning Wake effects have a 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% chance, each turn, to remove a status effect (physical or magical) from the targets.

If the target is hostile, it will remove a beneficial effect.

If the target is friendly, it will remove a detrimental effect (but still burn).
value2.name: Cleansing Flames

value.info_text: Surround yourself with Wildfire, increasing all your fire damage by 3.4%, 6.2%, 8.4%, 10%, 12%, ignoring 20%, 34%, 42%, 46%, 49% fire resistance of your targets and reducing self-inflicted fire damage by 18%, 36%, 54%, 72%, 91%.
value.name: Wildfire

value2.info_text: Surround yourself with Wildfire, increasing all your fire damage by 3.4%, 6.2%, 8.4%, 10%, 12%, ignoring 25%, 41%, 47%, 50%, 52% fire resistance of your targets and reducing self-inflicted fire damage by 18%, 36%, 54%, 72%, 91%.
value2.name: Wildfire

value.info_text:
Fire a charged shot at the farthest target with your tail-mounted steamgun that pierces through your enemies, ignoring armor and dealing 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% weapon damage as lightning.

This takes no time to use.

Fire a charged shot at the farthest target with your tail-mounted steamgun that pierces through your enemies, ignoring armor and dealing 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% weapon damage as lightning.

In addition, you can instantly activate this talent to gain a sudden burst of speed, moving to a tile in range 3, 5, 6, 7, 7.
value.name: Magnetic Accelerator

In addition, you can instantly activate this talent to gain a sudden burst of speed, moving to a tile in range 3, 5, 6, 7, 7.

value.info_text:
Enhancements to your targeting systems give all ranged attacks a 15%, 24%, 30%, 35%, 40% chance to trigger an immediate shot from your tail-mounted steamgun for 100% damage as lightning.

In addition, your physical and lightning resistance penetration is increased by 17%, 29%, 38%, 44%, 50%.
value.name: Advanced Targeting System

value2.info_text:
Enhancements to your targeting systems give all ranged attacks a 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% chance to trigger an immediate shot from your tail-mounted steamgun for 100% damage as lightning.

In addition, your physical and lightning resistance penetration is increased by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.

value.info_text:
Lock on to your target with your rocket pod for 5 turns.

While locked on your regular rocket pod attacks are disabled. However, each turn you automatically fire a rocket barrage dealing 89%, 119%, 143%, 162%, 180% increased damage at your target.

Marked targets also lose 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 defense and cannot benefit from concealment or evasion.

The defense loss will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Lock On

value2.info_text:
Lock on to your target with your rocket pod for 5 turns.

While locked on your regular rocket pod attacks are disabled. However, each turn you automatically fire a rocket barrage dealing 89%, 119%, 143%, 162%, 180% increased damage at your target.

You use your rocket pods to launch yourself into the air for 3 turns, firing a radius 2 barrage of rockets that deal 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% steamgun damage as fire in radius 2.

While flying you gain 423%, 511%, 589%, 660%, 727% movement speed, 14%, 27%, 35%, 40%, 44% chance to evade melee and ranged attacks, and can reactivate this talent at will to repeat the rocket barrage.

Using any talent other than Rocket Barrage will end this effect immediately.
value.name: Death From Above

value.info_text: Enhancements to your mecharachnid combat skill increases your melee and ranged evasion by 11%, 19%, 24%, 27%, 30%, and causes you to automatically strike adjacent enemies with your tailsaw for 100%, 122%, 138%, 151%, 164% damage each turn.
value.name: Defensive Protocol

value.info_text: You strike the target with your tailsaw for 141%, 166%, 185%, 202%, 216% damage. If this hits, you attempt to clamp them with your pincers for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. This pins, reduces their attack, spell and mind speed by 9%, 21%, 27%, 31%, 35%, and lets you make a free, unavoidable strike with your tailsaw against them each turn for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% damage. This ends if you move more than 1 tile from the target.
value.name: Pincer Strike

value2.info_text: You strike the target with your tailsaw for 141%, 166%, 185%, 202%, 216% damage. If this hits, you attempt to clamp them with your pincers for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. This ends if you move more than 1 tile from the target.
value2.name: Pincer Strike

value.info_text:
On falling below 0 life, you engage an automated repair mode. While in this mode you cannot act, but can survive below -118, -347, -523, -671, -802 life, heal for 21, 59, 88, 113, 135 life each turn and have all resistances increased by 10%, 22%, 30%, 35%, 40%. This will last until you are destroyed or until you are fully healed.

This effect has a cooldown.
value.name: Automated Repair System

value2.info_text:
On falling below 0 life, you engage an automated repair mode. While in this mode you cannot act, but can survive below -118, -347, -523, -671, -802 life, heal for 21, 59, 88, 113, 135 life each turn and have all resistances increased by 14%, 27%, 35%, 40%, 44%. This will last until you are destroyed or until you are fully healed.

This effect has a cooldown.
value2.name: Automated Repair System

value.info_text:
You send a saw mounted on an automated steam propulsor to assault a foe, dealing 43, 58, 69, 79, 88 physical damage each turn for 4 turns and silencing it.

At the end of the duration, the saw explodes for 220, 298, 359, 411, 456 fire damage and flies back, pulling the target up to 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 tiles towards you.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Explosive Saw

value2.info_text:
You send a saw mounted on an automated steam propulsor to assault a foe, dealing 43, 58, 69, 79, 88 physical damage each turn for 4 turns and silencing it.

At the end of the duration, the saw explodes for 220, 298, 359, 411, 456 fire damage and flies back, pulling the target up to 5, 8, 8, 9, 9 tiles towards you.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value2.name: Explosive Saw

value.info_text:
When you kill a foe with a melee strike you quickly throw some of their remains in your steam engine, instantly regenerating 4, 7, 10, 12, 14 steam.

When you deal a critical melee strike you also have a 9%, 19%, 25%, 29%, 31% chance to cut a part of your foe and use it in your steam engine.

When either of those happens this strikes fear in all foes in radius 4 of the victim, brainlocking them for 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns.

To the meat grinder!
value.name: Mow Down

value.info_text:
You tessellate your cloak with small pieces of metal, providing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 damage reduction against all attacks.

The myriad metal scraps also help against incoming projectiles, providing a 33%, 37%, 39%, 41%, 43% chance of deflecting them to a nearby spot.

value2.info_text:

Your cloak is lined with an automated health system that activate when no enemies are visible.

When it triggers, you will be healed for 170, 230, 277, 317, 352 life.

At talent level 3, it will also remove one detrimental physical effect.

The system can only trigger once every 9, 8, 7, 6, 5 turns.

Spin your saws wildly around you to create a wall of steamy sawteeth.

All melee damage against you is reduced by 12%, 16%, 20%, 22%, 24%, you have 12%, 16%, 20%, 22%, 24% chance to evade projectiles and you can never take a blow that deals more than 100%, 86%, 79%, 73%, 70% of your max life.

Split their bones on the saws of death!

The Metal Punisher!

value2.info_text:

The Metal Punisher!

value.info_text:
Working iron has honed your body into an amazing shape, granting 5, 10, 14, 18, 22 strength and constitution.

At talent level 5, you are so incredibly built that you gain one size category.
value.name: Massive Physique

value2.info_text:
Working iron has honed your body into an amazing shape, granting 2, 5, 7, 10, 13 strength and constitution.

At talent level 5, you are so incredibly built that you gain one size category.
value2.name: Massive Physique

value.info_text:
Working long hours at a forge has made you incredibly slow to tire and given you endless vitality.

Your healing factor is increased by 5%, 10%, 14%, 17%, 20% and your life regeneration by 3.51, 5.23, 6.55, 7.66, 8.64.

Stopping you is nearly impossible; your pinning resistance is increased by 21%, 33%, 41%, 46%, 51%.
value.name: Endless Endurance

value2.info_text:

Your healing factor is increased by 2%, 5%, 7%, 10%, 13% and your life regeneration by 1.30, 2.60, 3.90, 5.20, 6.50.

Stopping you is nearly impossible; your pinning resistance is increased by 19%, 39%, 58%, 78%, 97%.
value2.name: Endless Endurance

value.info_text:
Slaving for many years at the forge has made you more resilient to physical pain and fire burns.

Your fire resistance is increased by 5%, 12%, 18%, 22%, 26% and your physical resistance by 3%, 9%, 14%, 18%, 21%.

At talent level 5, you are so accustomed to the flames that you become immune to the fireburn effect.
value.name: Life in the Flames

value2.info_text:

Your fire resistance is increased by 6%, 13%, 19%, 26%, 32% and your physical resistance by 3%, 7%, 11%, 15%, 19%.

At talent level 5, you are so accustomed to the flames that you become immune to the fireburn effect.
value2.name: Life in the Flames

value.info_text:
You can easily see the weak points in your enemy's defenses. After all, you know to look for the same flaws in your own work.

This grants 5, 8, 11, 14, 16 armour penetration and 5%, 12%, 18%, 22%, 26% critical strike multiplier.

At talent level 5, you can also fight stealthed and invisible creatures without penalty.
value.name: Craftsman's Eye

value2.info_text:

Damage will increase with Steampower.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.

The pain shall never stop!

value.info_text:

When a creature survives the miasma it becomes immune to it for 9 turns.

value2.info_text: You become difficult to target through the thick smog generated by your Miasma Engine. While surrounded by miasma you have a 3%, 6%, 7%, 8%, 8% chance to entirely avoid damage, increased by 1%, 2%, 2%, 2%, 3% per stack.

For every stack beyond the first the damage dealt is increased by 50% and there is a 24%, 48%, 60%, 69%, 75% chance to remove an additional effect.
