value.info_text:
Your inner flame is strong. Each time that you receive a blow that would kill you, your body is wreathed in flames.

The flames will cauterize the wound, fully absorbing all damage done this turn, but they will continue to burn for 8 turns.

Each turn 10% of the damage absorbed will be dealt by the flames. This will bypass resistance and affinity.

Warning: this has a cooldown.
value.name: Cauterize
require: Level 25, Mag 50; Have received at least 3500 fire damage and have cast at least 1000 spells

value2.info_text:
Your inner flame is strong. Each time that you receive a blow that would kill you, your body is wreathed in flames.

The flames will cauterize the wound, fully absorbing all damage done this turn, but they will continue to burn for 8 turns.

Each turn 10% of the damage absorbed will be dealt by the flames. This will bypass resistance and affinity.

Warning: this has a cooldown.
value2.name: Cauterize
require: Level 25, Mag 50; Have received at least 7500 fire damage and have cast at least 1000 spells

value.info_text:
This is your true goal and the purpose of all necromancy - to become a powerful and everliving Lich!

Once learnt, the next time you are killed, the arcane forces you unleash will be able to rebuild your body into the desired Lichform.

Liches are immune to poisons, diseases, fear, cuts, stuns, do not need to breath and are 20% resistant to cold and darkness.

Liches also gain +12 Magic, Willpower and Cunning, 60% chance to ignore critical hits, +4 life rating (not retroactive), +35 spell and mental saves and 7 mana regeneration.

Liches gain a new racial tree with the following talents:

  • Neverending Unlife: A Lich body is extremely resilient, being able to go into negative life and when destroyed it can regenerate itself.
  • Frightening Presence: Your mere presence is enough to shatter the resolve of most, reducing their saves, damage and movement speed.
  • Doomed for Eternity: As a creature of doom and despair you now constantly spawn undead shadows around you.
  • Commander of the Dead: You are able to infuse all undead party members (including yourself) with un-natural power, increasing your physical and spellpower.
value.name: #SANDY_BROWN#Lich (Race Evolution)
require: Level 25, Wil 25, Mag 50; Is a living creature that knows necromancy

value.info_text:
Thaumaturgists have unlocked a deeper understanding of their spells, allowing them to combine the elements into new ways and to empower them.

The spells Flame, Manathrust, Lightning, Pulverizing Auger and Ice Shards are permanently turned into 3-wide beams spells.

In addition they have access to the unique Thaumaturgy class tree:

  • Orb of Thaumaturgy: a temporary orb that duplicates any beam spells that you cast
  • Multicaster: When casting a beam spell adds a chance to also cast an other archmage spell
  • Slipstream: Allows movement when casting beams
  • Elemental Array Burst: a powerful, multi-elemental beam spell that can inflict all elemental ailments and can not be resisted

The fine spellcasting required for wide beams and all thaumaturgy spells can only happen while wearing cloth. Anything heavier will hinder the casting too much.
value.name: #LIGHT_STEEL_BLUE#High Thaumaturgist (Class Evolution)
require: Level 25, Wil 25, Mag 50; Unlocked the High Thaumaturgist evolution

value.info_text:
You create an Arcane Amplification Drone at the selected location for 3 turns.

When you cast a spell that damages the drone it will ripple the damage as 130% arcane damage of the initial hit in radius 4.
value.name: Arcane Amplification Drone
require: Level 25, Mag 50; Have gained the Tales of the Spellblaze achievement with this or any previous character for the current difficulty & permadeath settings.

value2.info_text:
You create an Arcane Amplification Drone at the selected location for 3 turns.

When you cast a spell that damages the drone it will ripple the damage as 160% arcane damage of the initial hit in radius 4.
value2.name: Arcane Amplification Drone
require: Level 25, Mag 50; Have gained the Tales of the Spellblaze achievement with this or any previous character for the current difficulty & permadeath settings.

value.info_text:
The code of the Sun Paladins can be a heavy burden. Wouldn't you like to let go?

To give in to the darkness?

This evolution fundamentally alters your class and character in a huge way. Do not take it lightly.

Any offensive combat techniques or unlockable Celestial talent trees you know will be exchanged for cursed versions, allowing you to cut a bloody trail through enemies, turning your radiance to gloom, and more while also gaining new combat styles and defenses.

The following talent trees are swapped:

  • Radiance turns into Gloom: Project onto others your own hate, hindering them
  • Guardian turns into Crimson Templar: Use the power of blood to control and defeat the fools that oppose you
  • Crusader turns into Dark Sun: Call upon the energies of dead suns to crush your foes

You will learn the following talents trees:

  • Bloodstained: Make your foes bleed!
  • Darkside: Every light casts a shadow, yours is powerful indeed
  • Hatred: Manifest your hatred through bleeding
  • Dirge: Sing of death and sorrow to strengthen your resolve

You will forget the following talent trees, refunding any talent points: Shield Offense, Two-handed Assault.

Also the cost of any talents of the Combat Techniques tree will be converted to hate instead of stamina.
value.name: #LIGHT_STEEL_BLUE#Fallen (Class Evolution)
require: Level 25, Mag 25, Wil 50; Unlocked the Fallen evolution

value.info_text:
Leap toward your target.

When you land your global speed is increased by 20%, 25%, 27%, 29%, 31% for 4 turns.
value.name: Ghoulish Leap

value2.info_text:
Leap toward your target.

When you land your global speed is increased by 21%, 25%, 28%, 30%, 31% for 4 turns.

value.info_text:
Vomit on the ground around you, healing any undead in the area and damaging anyone else.

Lasts 10 turns and deals 34, 42, 48, 52, 56 blight damage or heals 52, 63, 72, 79, 85 life.

Creatures standing in the retch also have 11%, 20%, 27%, 32%, 36% chance to remove a physical effect each turn; undeads will be stripped from a detrimental effect while others will be stripped from a beneficial effect.

When you stand in your own retch your racial -20% global speed is cancelled.
value.name: Retch

Lasts 10 turns and deals 34, 42, 48, 52, 56 blight damage or heals 52, 63, 72, 79, 85 life.

Creatures standing in the retch also have 6%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% chance to remove a physical effect each turn; undeads will be stripped from a detrimental effect while others will be stripped from a beneficial effect.

When you stand in your own retch your racial -20% global speed is cancelled.
value2.name: Retch

value.info_text:
Gnaw your target for 106%, 129%, 147%, 162%, 175% damage. If your attack hits, the target may be infected with Ghoul Rot for 3, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns.

Each turn, Ghoul Rot inflicts 29, 37, 44, 49, 54 blight damage.

Targets suffering from Ghoul Rot rise as friendly ghouls when slain.

Ghouls last for 3, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns and can use Gnaw, Ghoulish Leap, Stun, and Rotting Disease.

The blight damage scales with your Constitution.
value.name: Gnaw

value2.info_text:
Gnaw your target for 106%, 129%, 147%, 162%, 175% damage. If your attack hits, the target may be infected with Ghoul Rot for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

Each turn, Ghoul Rot inflicts 29, 37, 44, 49, 54 blight damage.

Targets suffering from Ghoul Rot rise as friendly ghouls when slain.

Ghouls last for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns and can use Gnaw, Ghoulish Leap, Stun, and Rotting Disease.

The blight damage scales with your Constitution.
value2.name: Gnaw

value.info_text:
A Lich's body is extremely hard to fully destroy. You only die with your life reaches -20, -56, -77, -90, -100.

In addition even when destroyed your body regenerates to full life.

The first time this happens, your transformation into a Lich is completed, granting you all the powers of Lichdom.

Any further death will still regenerate you but you will need to consume the essence of a creature of unique/boss/elite boss or more rank within 40, 75, 98, 116, 130 turns to sustain yourself.

If you have not killed one when the duration expires or if you are killed again in this duration, you die permanently.

If this happens this power can never re-activate, even if you managed to resurrect by other means.
value.name: Neverending Unlife

value.info_text:
Your mere presence is terrying to any foes that dare stand against you.

Every turn all foes in radius 4, 7, 8, 10, 10 must make a metal save against your spellpower/physical power (whichever is highest) or become frightened (bypassing fear immunity), reducing all their saves by 14, 25, 34, 42, 48, all damage by 12%, 18%, 22%, 26%, 29% and movement speed by 10%, 19%, 24%, 28%, 30%.

If they successfully resist, they are immune for 18, 14, 12, 10, 9 turns.
value.name: Frightening Presence

value.info_text:
While this ability is active, you will continually call up to 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 level 1, 10, 25, 40, 50 shadows to aid you in battle. Shadows are weak combatants that can: Use Arcane Reconstruction to heal themselves (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), Blindside their opponents (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), and Phase Door from place to place.

Shadows ignore 14%, 44%, 68%, 87%, 100% of the damage dealt to them by their master.
value.name: Doomed For Eternity

value.info_text:
You are so full with power that it overflows out of you whenever you cast a spell.

Upon spell cast you have 9%, 16%, 21%, 25%, 29% chances to boost the physical power, spellpower, mindpower and all saves of all friendly undeads in sight (including yourself) by 14, 29, 41, 51, 60 for 4 turns.
value.name: Commander of the Dead

value.info_text:
Creates a shield of bones, absorbing 511, 634, 727, 804, 871 damage. Lasts for 10 turns.

The total damage the shield can absorb increases with your Dexterity.
value.name: Bone Armour

value2.info_text:
Creates a shield of bones, absorbing 516, 640, 733, 811, 878 damage. Lasts for 10 turns.

The total damage the shield can absorb increases with your Dexterity.
value2.name: Bone Armour

value.info_text: Your undead bones are very resilient, reducing the duration of all detrimental effects on you by up to 12%, 25%, 33%, 40%, 45%.
value.name: Resilient Bones

value2.info_text: Your undead bones are very resilient, reducing the duration of all detrimental effects on you by up to 13%, 26%, 35%, 42%, 48%.
value2.name: Resilient Bones

value.info_text:
Reposition some of your bones, healing yourself for 159, 328, 456, 562, 655.

At level 5, you will gain the ability to completely re-assemble your body should it be destroyed (can only be used once).
value.name: Re-assemble

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
Your skin forms icy scales and your flesh toughens, increasing your Maximum Life by 5%, 8%, 11%, 13%, 15% and your Armour by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32.

You also deal 29, 35, 41, 45, 49 cold damage to any enemies that physically strike you.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.

The life increase will scale with your Talent Level, and your Armour and retaliation cold damage will scale with Mindpower.
value.name: Icy Skin

value2.info_text:
Your skin forms icy scales and your flesh toughens, increasing your Maximum Life by 2%, 5%, 7%, 10%, 12% and your Armour by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32.

You also deal 29, 35, 41, 45, 49 cold damage to any enemies that physically strike you.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.

The life increase will scale with your Talent Level, and your Armour and retaliation cold damage will scale with Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Summons an icy wall of 3, 5, 5, 7, 9 length for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. Ice walls are transparent, but block projectiles and enemies.

Ice walls also emit freezing cold, dealing 9.13, 12, 15, 17, 19 damage for each ice wall within radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 of an enemy, and with each wall giving a 25% chance to freeze an enemy. This cold cannot hurt the talent user or their allies.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.
value.name: Ice Wall

Summons an icy wall of 3, 5, 5, 7, 9 length for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. Ice walls are transparent, but block projectiles and enemies.

Increases Physical Power by 30, increases damage done with shields by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76%, and allows you to dual-wield shields.

Also, all of your melee attacks will perform a shield bash in addition to their normal effects.

value.info_text:
When you use your Resilience of the Dwarves racial power your skin becomes so tough that it even absorbs damage from non-physical attacks.

Non-physical damage is reduced by 66%, 83%, 93%, 100%, 106% of your total armour value (ignoring hardiness).

While this effect is not active, half of it is still applied against foes entangled by your stone vines.

For Drems this effect activates as long as the hungering mouth summoned by From Below It Devours is alive.

value2.info_text:
When you use your Resilience of the Dwarves racial power your skin becomes so tough that it even absorbs damage from non-physical attacks.

When you are hit in melee, you will get a free attack against the attacker with the shards doing 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% shield damage (as Nature).

From the ground around you, you form living stone vines extending from your feet.

Each turn, the vines will attempt to seize a random target within radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7.

Affected creatures are pinned to the ground and take 32, 42, 50, 56, 61 nature damage each turn for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

A creature entangled by the vines will have a chance to break free each turn, and will automatically succeed if it is more than 8, 9, 10, 10, 11 grids away from you.

The chance to affect targets and damage increase with talent level and Willpower.
value.name: Stone Vines

value2.info_text:
From the ground around you, you form living stone vines extending from your feet.

Each turn, the vines will attempt to seize a random target within radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7.

Affected creatures are pinned to the ground and take 21, 27, 32, 36, 40 nature damage each turn for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

A creature entangled by the vines will have a chance to break free each turn, and will automatically succeed if it is more than 8, 9, 10, 10, 11 grids away from you.

Your devotion to nature has made your body more attuned to the natural world and resistant to unnatural energies.

Each turn, this cloud deals 79, 108, 130, 148, 164 acid damage to each foe with a 25% chance to blind and a 25%, 30%, 34%, 37%, 40% chance of burning away one magical sustain or beneficial magical effect.

value.info_text:
The waters of life flow through you, purifying any poisons or diseases currently affecting you.

Cold: +9, +15, +20, +25, +30 Armour

On you, this effect causes each heal received to restore 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 equilibrium and be 140%, 152%, 160%, 165%, 170% effective.

value.info_text:
Your body is more like that of an ooze.

When you take damage, you may split and create a Bloated Ooze nearby within your line of sight.

This ooze has as much health as twice the damage you took (up to a maximum of 255, 351, 421, 478, 527, based on your Mindpower and maximum life).

The chance to split equals the percent of your health lost times 1.52, 1.67, 1.77, 1.84, 1.90.

You may have up to 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 Bloated Oozes active at any time (limited by talent level and the summoning limit), and all damage you take will be split equally between you and them so long as this talent is active.

Bloated Oozes last for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, are very resilient (14%, 22%, 27%, 31%, 35% all damage resistance to damage not coming through your shared link), and regenerate life quickly.

The chance to split increases with your Cunning.

value.info_text:
Spray forth a glob of acidic moisture at your enemy.

The target will take 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 Mindpower-based acid damage.

Enemies struck have a 25% chance to be Disarmed for three turns, as their weapon is rendered useless by an acid coating.

At Talent Level 5, this becomes a piercing line of acid.

Every level in Acidic Spray additionally raises your Mindpower by 4, passively.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
